author: Andy's Reviews
title: Shirt as dark as the future of Earth
body: I bought these shirts because the graphic tees I've worn since the 9th grade (I'm 25) no longer cut it. I'm supposed to be an adult (we all know this is Fake News), and can't be wearing a shirt that says "Vote for Pedro" on it to a business meeting. Who am I kidding, though. I haven't ever attended a business meeting - thanks for ruining the economy, mom and dad! Needless to say, I'm the freshest looking guy in my Social Justice class now. This was the perfect amount of shirts, now that I don't have to choose which shirt I want to wear in the mornings I can spend more time thinking about where I'm going to buy my Avocado Toast.

author: Delvaille
title: Good product!
body: I really like the length of the shirt. Long enough to cover my belly. I'm 5'7" 170lb and whenever I buy size medium the shirts are a tad short. But these ones have a perfect length.

author: AXE
title: I am typically a medium, and the reviews said ...
body: I am typically a medium, and the reviews said they tend to fit small so I ordered large. They are a bit too big for my liking, but not so much. So if you're a medium or slightly larger, buy large... If you're on the smaller side of medium, buy medium.

author: VT
title: Good shirt for the price
body: I ordered these to wear while I workout and do lawn work.  The Dry Fit (polyester) irritates my skin.  These claim to have moisture wicking technology, but I've never heard of cool spire.  The only cotton wicking technology I've heard of is wicking windows and transdry (charged cotton).  I have no idea which one Cool Spire is based off of.  6 shirts for the price of $22 is good.  None of the shirts have a defects with the stitching like others have claimed, and the sizing is right.  I like the length of the shirts, they are not too long that they almost go down to your knees, but they are long enough that if you raise you arms, they still cover your mid section.  The quality of the cotton is fine, it isn't the softest, but I've had far worse.  I'll say it is average to slightly above average.  I've purchased white undershirts from Gildan in the past, they are the same quality as their regular shirts, but not as soft as their premium shirts.  The only negative I would say is that they don't look exactly like the pictures.  In the pictures the body portion looks more fitted, in reality the body portion is simply straight down, but I was expecting that based off other reviews.ProsGood quality for the priceI found the fit to be accurate to the sizing chartlength of shirt is goodNone of the shirts had any defects that others have claimed.ConsSoftness of cotton is average to at best slightly above average.Shirts are not as depicted in the photos.  The body is of shirt is not fitted, but straight down.NeutralI have no clue what technology Cool Spire is based off of or if it uses both.

author: Hava
title: Check the collar for a label printed on it.
body: I purchased these t shirts I my hi and toner to work. He outside all day and white is better in the summer (works construction). So the feel of them is great, not too thick, not too thin. They’re a great fit in him. He’s 6”2. But the most annoying thing is that some of the shirts have the label printed on the front of the collar. Like it’s been stamped??? See the picture. These ones are an embarrassment to wear obviously... so out of 6 shirts, we use 4. Maybe too much mass production...

author: Amazonian
title: Poor quality after a couple of washes. Better options out there.
body: I got these because of the good price and generally good reviews. I got the large and out of the package they looked and fit great. However after two washes, they fit like a smaller medium and the length is too short for me now. They look like garbage as around the neck they are fraying already. I will definitely not recommend these to anyone. Better options are Old Navy moisture wicking shirts when they go on sale or Kirkland Tshirts from Costco.

author: mark
title: no suprises same as at the store take your normal size there well ajusted
body: i was afraid i was petrified, of them being to small, so i said to my self.. better take bigger just in case, so i took XL instead of L, turns out there too big ,, but you know what, I'll survive. so a suggest you take your regular size the same as always, there not cheapo and are the real size retailed

author: Ryan Parenteau
title: Shrinks!
body: These shirts fit fantastic out of the package, unfortunately not for long. With successive washings they shrank in length and turned into something that resembles a paper bag. They are tough and as such have been demoted to work shirts (trades). Still looking for a good T that doesn't shrink? Keep looking.

author: A. R
title: Fantastic for work undershirts
body: Hubby wears out shirts luke their going out of style so decided to try these on a whim and we both absolutely love them. He likes the fact they are simple black tshirts, not too heavy or too thin on fabric, and they fit awesome. They are pretty long (medium was just about crotch length on 5'8" hubby) but he likes them longer so they tuck into work pants nicely. I love the fact that at $22 for a 6 pack, it works out to $3.50 a shirt. SOOOOO much better then him destroying a nice tshirt that runs $25/shirt.We will be stoking up on these for sure!

author: Chris
title: Honest
body: Last review you need to read about these tshirts..Other than fact they are about 2 inches longer than they need to be, they fit perfect.The only caveat is that if you wash in hot water they shrink about 2 inches in length.  I bought packs of white and black..  Black washed in cold...same length as original after washing. When comparing the black to the white tshirts washed in hot water, you can see clearly see a difference in length.All above being said, I would buy thrm again as they are decent quality and even if they shrink due to washing in hot water they come out same length as other brands.

author: Josephine
title: Good shirts for a lab coat
body: Bought these shirts to use as lab coats for a childs science birthday party. I wanted to sharpie a "lab" look on them but ran out of time because I ordered at the last minute but relieved they arrived on time. They fit comfortably over the kids clothes.Not sure how they wash as each kid took theirs home.

author: Auray
title: Paid over 23$ for 5 pieces. Is it worth ...
body: Paid over 23$ for 5 pieces. Is it worth? Certainly not. Quality is 2-3/10. I'm giving 2 stars because of fast shipping that's all..

author: Stephen Boulton
title: Good shirts for the price
body: The size chart is pretty accurate.  I'm a big guy that usually borders on large to extra large.  I got XL assuming there would be some shrinkage in the wash.  When I got the shirts originally, they were pretty large both in length and width.  They did shrink quite a bit in the wash, but I would probably still go with L if I get them in the future.  Otherwise, they are nice shirts.  The material is comfortable and the colours look good.

author: Darihana
title: Perfecto
body: Perfect thanks very much

author: G Anderson
title: Low quality
body: When I removed the clear tape holding the first shirt into its little ball the cloth ripped. Hard to believe a material can be so flimsy that a bit of tape adhesive is enough to tear it! I haven't even opened the other four yet, and will have to be extremely careful with the tape removal, hopefully I salvage four good ones. But I am not optimistic that these will last very long. The material is extremely thin. I should really return them but maybe I'll get some (careful!) use out of the others. The fit is fine, pretty much as described. Too bad about the quality tho. I can't recommend these.

author: Daniel Pineault
title: Questionable quality
body: UpdateSadly, trying the other shirts and I already have fraying where the bottom seam is completely coming undone after having the shirt on for the first time.  I didn't expect too much from these shirts, but did expect them to last a few washes before starting to fall apart.Original ReviewMid-range in quality.  Not the thinnest, but not the thickest either.  Good as undershirts in my opinion.Sizing is good.Grey shirt has some stretch to it.No tag, silk screened label instead.Made in Bangladesh.The only question left is how do they wash?  Will they shrink?  Time will tell, but initial impressions are very good.

author: James Heater
title: Recommended
body: I bought these not expecting too much but new shirts since mine don't fit as I've put on alot of weight. The quality of them is on-par with your average Walmart shirts but noticably thinner, which is good for the summer. They fit well off the start, haven't washed them yet and tried them on (as they're cotton and cotton shrinks a bit), but I believe that they'll shorten up in length a fair bit (they're a bit long) but I would definitely recommend buying a size larger than usual. As of right now I can wear large t-shirts, bordering into XL depending on who made the shirt, and I bought large after reading the reviews about them being somewhat smaller than usual. They fit quite well, but again unsure of how they'll fit after I washing.I would recommend buying a size larger if your current shirt size is bordering on restricting (shirt doesn't flow freely down your torso) as I believe they'll shrink a fair bit after being washedOther than those observations I would say that for the price and quality it's worth buying a pack!

author: Tristan Cuschieri
title: Great Value
body: The shirts themselves are great - high quality, and comfortable.  As you've probably already read, they are NOT pre-shrunk, so expect them to shrink if you throw them in the dryer.I'm 5'6 130lbs, and I ordered small size, completely underestimating the shrinkage factor.  Prior to shrinking, they fit PERFECTLY, and were extremely comfortable.  After washing/drying, they shrank noticeably at the shoulders/arm length, making them feel a little too constrictive for me.  However, given that I bought them to wear while sleeping, I just took some time to stretch out the fabric a bit (carefully), and found that they became comfortable again.One last point - the reason I bought these as sleep shirts was for the moisture wicking (as I tend to sweat at night while I sleep).  I have found that I am noticeably more comfortable during the night wearing these shirts, compared to the other ones I usually wear, despite my sweating.  That makes a huge difference to the quality of my sleep and the number of times I wake up as a result throughout the night.  So for anyone who has the same problem, I don't think you'll be disappointed by this.Just keep in mind - if you wear a small size and plan on drying these with the rest of your clothes in a dryer, I recommend ordering a medium.

author: Amber L
title: parachuting at the bottom
body: I've been looking for a good fitting T-shirt that doesn't end up becoming loose at the bottom.  I have under armour T-shirts that fit the same way everytime I put them on and do not parachute through out the day at the bottom.  That's what I am looking for, but without the logo on the shirt.These T-shirts fit good out of the dryer, but by afternoon they are stretched out at the bottom. They also stretch out around the arms/shoulders through out the day..  My shoulder's are much bigger then my mid section so its not my body stretching them out.BAck to the hunt for a T-shirt that doesn't stretch out as you wear them!

author: Jason
title: Great shirts, but issue with quality control
body: Ordered these shirts because I know gildan shirts fit the way I want them too. However one black shirt in the pack is not the same size as the other shirts, including the other "identical" black shirt in the pack. Even though the shirt is tagged as a medium, The one shirt is about an inch shorter and the sleeves are also about an inch short, so it bunches up in my armpit and sits weird on my shoulders. So unfortunately I only got 4 wearable shirts. Which I turn makes it less of a good deal. Which I'm not thrilled about. It's too bad because I love these shirts. I still recommend them but Quality control is an issue.EDIT: every shirt shrunk after wash. The length is still acceptable, but the sleeves are pretty much crammed into my armpit. So these are clearly not pre shrunk. Advice I guess would be to buy a size larger? I'm torn I still like the feel of the shirts but this is a bit discouraging.

author: Quinn
title: Good Quality, Good Price
body: These sre good quality shirts. It's a nice blend of fabrics that give a strong hold without being thick or rough to touch. They fit as expected and I only have two complaints. There was some stitching that came lose unser the inner arm seam after just one use (Only on one of the shirts). Also they hang much lower than I am used to sitting half way down my jean pockets. I am 5,10 as a reference and have never had that problem with shirts that fit my chest. If you are on the smaller side maybe consider going down a size.

author: C. Bissonnette
title: Plain dark Tees
body: I got to a point where i did'nt feel like i wanted to pay a big brand to ahve the privilidge of wearing there t-shirt. They would often buy the product from Gildan or fruit of the loom any way.So i decided to cut the middle man.Thease are great. Fit as they suposed to. Every so often one of the dark gray of semi green one will shrink in the wash. Not a fan of crop top myself but i'm sure i can find someone who would.Other than that, you can't go wrong wiht those.

author: Vaxster
title: Over-rated
body: 5 years ago I purchased similar George brand t-shirts from WalMart, went back looking for same but couldn't find any so purchased these end of October 2020 after reading the reviews, but these pale in comparison to the basic George ones. Overall the fabric is thinner, especially noticeable around the neck which is fraying already, but I think the most telling feature of low quality of these t-shirts is the amount of lint that stays attached after removal from my clothes dryer. Nothing else comes out of my dryer with lint attached anywhere near these shirts. I suspect it's because of a rougher surface that catches the lint so even though the t-shirts feel soft to the touch, they must be made of an uneven fabric. Quite displeased with this attribute so will not re-purchase and won't recommend to family members.

author: ReD4Zone
title: Seriously for the price
body: It fit just right for a casual tshirt. They arent fancy but useful for everyday at home or chill. The quality is good. It's not a 60$ tshirt but it's what a plain solid tshirt should be.  I have a hard time with the designer clothes this days being all super slim. I am not fat but again I am not slim and this fit just ok. For the price you can't complain and you shouldnt feel bad either.Good buy ! It was fast and well packaged.

author: Tee Ehm
title: Good quality. Happy with this purchase.
body: These shirts are lighter weight (thinner material) than what you'd expect from a regular t-shirt. That being said, they're perfect to wear as an undershirt, but you could also wear them as a regular t-shirt. The collar sits the same as a regular shirt, not lower like some undershirts. I usually wear XL so that's what I ordered. When they arrived they looked huge, at least a 2XL. After one wash/dryer cycle there was a bit of shrinkage, but that's to be expected with 100% cotton. These now fit me perfectly with the shrinking from the wash. Time will tell how well these hold up, but I'm not too concerned because I paid about $22 for 6 shirts. In my books that's very reasonable. The quality is definitely better than I expected. I'm definitely ordering more.

author: CK
title: Best fitting shirt I've bought yet!
body: I typically have a very hard time buying shirts. I have a taller frame, so I end up having to buy shirts a size bigger to fit the length of my body and arms. These shirts fit me very well, long enough in the body while still being a slimmer fit, sleeves are a good length, but I wish they were a little longer. I feel if I ordered a size bigger, the sleeves would have been perfect but the body would have been too wide and long.

author: Marc Chouinard
title: Benchmarked, great buy!
body: There was some mixed reviews about this pack so I did some testing :-)BEST Result: Wear it once for a day before washing, wash warm+dryer will keep the same size, no shrink. Cold water had the same results (Black / dark grey)GOOD Result: Washed warm and dryer, did shrinked a bit,  but was able to strech (light grey / black / dark grey)I am between L and XL, and a pack of L fit perfect.  The light grey *seems* a bit smaller, but could be an illusion (noticed before and after wash so it's not a shrinking issue). The only negative thing (which is also a positive), it's very thin, so yes it's comfortable but it won't last forever compared to thicker versions. Worth the price

author: David Laliberte
title: Price, Quality and shipping big plus. Very pleased.6
body: What can I say that best describes this product. First price excellent. Second the quality excellent cotton and fit. I'm 6'1 and 190 lbs. Average upper body size. I ordered the XL 46-48 size because that's all they showed at time of purchase. They fit well, but haven't washed them yet. Hopefully, they won't shrink too much. I have a little to play with as I don't like tight fitting t shirts to start with. As for price 5 shirts for $25 how can you go wrong. If they do shrink after washing them then, I'd still reorder again but go for 2X if available. Shipping was fast around 10 to 12 days. Would buy again.David L.Ontario, Canada

author: Amosobadias
title: Pay more if you want quality
body: You get what you pay for here. Lots of loose thread so you basically need to finish making these yourself by turning inside out and trimming all the dangley thread. And for some reason these collect a lot of lint in the wash and come out of dryer covered in it. Nothing but these t-shirts picks up all the lint. So they require a lot of lint rolling after washing. For the price they are ok though.

author: AL
title: Terrible cutting and fit
body: I don't know who Gildan uses as a template for their cuttings but that guy must be an out of shape man who never hits the gym - narrow shoulders and big stomach. I'm 5'9", decent build; not overly athletic or slim but I do take care of myself. I tried medium first. Neck and shoulders were way too tight. Tried large. Upper body felt fine but way too much material left at the stomach (both width and length wise). In both cases, sleeves were too short (just covered my shoulders). If you want a youthful, somewhat athletic fit, stay away from Gildan. Very disappointed.

author: JK
title: Neck, like every cheap shirt, is trying to choke you.
body: Thick, way too thick, neck hem. Hot and heavy, and cheap looking. Ruins the shirt.And the hole, is way to small. Are these supposed to be turtle necks? Could pass as a turtle neck.They fit too far forward, as in, the neck holes are choking your throat, while it's hanging down your back. This, at perfect posture.I'm 6,2, 160 lbs. These aren't very comfortable. At dirt, can hardly complain, but I'd rather spend $30 on a shirt that was designed to fit the human body.These are made to a price point, and that's what you will get.

author: Von Rex
title: Shirts are too small
body: I ordered an X-large, but it's a little tight on the sides like a large shirt would be.  Not quite as bad, but it's closer to a large than it is to an X-large.  And I hear from other comments that these have a tendency to shrink, too.I don't see a whole lot to recommend these shirts other than their price.  Gildan had one thing to do here, measure the sizes right, and they can't do that.  At least it's not as bad as their testicle-squeezing underwear, which I had to return immediately.  I'd stay away from this company.

author: J$B
title: Lightweight cotton, XL fits right but pending shrinkage?  Would prefer all black / grey.
body: I like Gildan, my first of these five-packs.  They're lighterweight than previous buys, look and feel good, durability in question.  At 6' / 46" the XL is closer fitting than previous XLs and haven't been washed yet - shrinkage?.  The 5-pack includes one dark grey or "carbon" colored shirt not my style, so I'd prefer either 3/2 mix of black and grey instead.  All said, hard to beat for the buck.

author: Rick Jones
title: Absolutely the worst quality for a cotton tee shirt.
body: These dirty are as thin as paper...They are a one time wear..once you wash the shirt once its done.... your large his now a small...cheapest quality you can get for a cotton shirt. Don't waste your time . Once you wear once then use it to clean your car with as this is all they are good for.  I don't recommend these shirts at all . I wish I hadn't bought them . Just poor quality junk wear.

author: Chantale Beaulieu
title: Rétrici énormément au lavage !
body: Amèrement déçu ! Au début, c'est des gilets de grandeurs parfaite mais à présent, avec quelques lavages, sa fait des gilets bedaine en haut de la ceinture!Photo en appui! Le gilet gris pâle vient de sortir de l'emballage et le gris foncé a été porté et lavé.Il rétrécissent peut importe la couleur (parfois ça peut être un tissu particulier qui rétréci) Mais ici, que ce soit un gris ou noir, tous foulent. Payer pas cher, mais sa vaut pas cher qui va finir assez vite en guenilles de garage.

author: Shil
title: Doubled in price since I bought them last
body: I bought the black 5 pack for $25 a year ago and now it’s $50?! This is beyond ridiculous. The other 5 packs are sub 30, so their pricing is arbitrary. Yes they’re good tshirts and comfortable, but they do fade out after a few washes. Moreover I don’t appreciate them doubling the price in a year, so won’t be buying anything from Gildan in the go foreseeable future.

author: KBS
title: Inaccurate product photos
body: The photos suggest that these shirts are more narrow at the body and waist than the shoulder. However, the body is in fact wider than the shoulder so if you are looking for something with an athletic fit, look elsewhere.

author: AmazonZ
title: I will buy Again!
body: I finaly find a piece of clothes which is not a scam. At first, when i unbox them, i was disappointed just like every time i buy clothes on internet, the shirt feel kind of too large and looked a little bit like potato bag, but when i put them in the wash machine they fitted perfectly, just as if they were made for me.Final note, I'm very Satisfied of what i got and i will surely buy this brand again in a near future.Thank you!

author: tc
title: Love these shirts for exercising in
body: First off, I am an overweight woman, and I always get/wear men's tshirts shirts for exercising because they aren't form fitting and tight over my blub. These shirts fit exactly as I was hoping. I always shake them out and hang them to dry so they don't shrink. I love how long they are. My only complaint is that I wish I could get a pack of 5 black shirts. I didn't want the light coloured shirts but had to get them in order to get 2 black shirts. :/

author: curtis
title: 12 T-shirts for 35 bucks!  200lbs 5"11 ordered the Large
body: Honestly you can go wrong with this purchase. I like my undershirts to be thin and these are just right.  They are white so I expect the armpit stains to eventually come lol.  Thats the beauty of it, with the price point you can afford to ditch these after a year of constant use and washing.  Or you can move them into the work shirt drawer afterwards.200lbs 5"11 ordered the Large

author: Brad
title: Great quality.
body: Great value, I wear them to work and at the price, I don’t care if they get dirty or damaged.They fit well, maybe a smidge long, but I like that in a work shirt. They wash nicely and are very soft. I’ve bought multiple packs over the last while and am always happy.

author: Lloyd P. Pittonet
title: 5 pack of shirts for the price of 4 from others.
body: Thanks to covid, and me being cheap, all my shirts are fitting a little tight so I bought the xl. I'm 6 foot, 250 lbs, and they fit as a guy who quickly put on weight would expect. And they're cheap, so when I lose the lbs having the motivation to do so, I won't feel bad about these shirts either bring something to do yardwork in, or to trash for rags.On a note about the quality: I've bought Gildan shirts in the past, they used to be my favourite brand but getting them has always been touch and go, but these are a little thinner material than I remembered. Nothing crazy, but noticable. Probably won't be ordering these again, even when I lose the lbs.

author: Kristen
title: Fits small, no stretch.
body: If you're a bit on the chonky side buy a size or two up for comfort! My partner is usually a 1x in shirts and buy 2x because he likes to have room to breathe. These are a second skin they're so tight and thats a 2x. They are kinda soft, but shrink bad in the wash and have zero stretch to them. Nice and long though which is a bonus as usually bigger gets wider not longer.

author: Amazon Customer
title: VERY weird fitment
body: These shirts fit incredibly weird. I ordered XL, I'm 6'1" 250lbs. The shirt sleeves are very long, almost elbow length and the shirt barely goes down to my belt.The main photo of the shirts shows a longer, more fitted shirt through the torso, which is exactly what I was looking for. These shirts were the complete opposite. Short and wide. Great for getting dirty around the house for when you're doing work but definitely not for wearing in public.

author: Anna kay
title: does not look like on picture
body: i bought this for my fit and slim 12 year old son he usually wears xs in mens but wasnt availble so i got s instead it is a bit big but not huge i think ill just run it through the washer/dryer once and then it should be ok . its longer than i thought though and the material is not what the picture indicates its basically just a cotton shirt doesnt look that great quality it is not shiny like in picture!

author: JT Elliott
title: Size Large - 6,2" 205 - 210 lbs & long torso - Fits Perfectly!
body: Fits perfectly.  Size Large. Not too tight, not too loose.  I am 6,2" and weigh roughly 205 - 210 lbs with a long torso and they fit well.  I hang dry my shirts as they would shrink and become too short if put in the dryer due to my long torso.  After washing and hang drying, they did not shrink or become too tight.  Have washed 5-6 times already and no pilling or neck stretch.  Would be buying again.

author: Alex
title: Really nice; one bad shirt.
body: 4 of the 5 shirts are still in good condition after a short while however one of them (the red shirt) tore at the seem after a single wash and will need repairing... I'm no seamstress but I will probably manage. The other shirts on the other hand are comfortable and have a nice fit.Great cost to shirt count; 5$ per shirt is how I like them.

author: Fred Deneault
title: Shrunk a bit after first wash
body: At $20 for 5 shirts, you usually don't expect much and you get what you paid for. These shirts are good looking. They shrunk a bit after the first wash so I'd recommend to maybe buy a size taller if you don't like "slim fit" clothes.Other than that, the quality is good.

author: Leon
title: Perfect item and fast shipment, quality is great
body: The media could not be loaded.

author: Sahib Singh
title: Low quality material
body: I ordered small size. New T shirt fits well but once washed, it loosed from biceps. Cheap material used by Gildan.Its only good for home wear and you cant wear for outings once its washed.I purchased H& M Tees. Better buy H & M Slim fit and regular fit ones. Their stuff is far better and fits perfectly well and wont loosen after wash.This Gildan t shirt is just good for wastage use once washed. Low quality product.

author: Amazonian
title: Great deal on this set
body: This is my second batch of these shirts, hopefully I will be buying smaller ones next time around. These are a little large for me, but I like to buy bigger than what I am. I like them, and they are a good deal for someone on a super tight budget.

author: Tank
title: You get what you pay for ...they are ok...
body: Not sure about these..i find them to tight near the chest and baggy where the stomach is... and im not thinking of putting them in the dryer cause im scared the shrink to much...  and there also not very soft...PS........  im 170 pounds and 5'8 ...  and I bought Medium ..

author: K Edstrom
title: Would Buy Again
body: These shirts are really soft and very comfortable. I bought them for myself during pregnancy so I would have something that fit but wasn't cut for a female. The black one really holds on to dog hair, even when washed. That is my only complaint, but I always where black around my golden retriever so it doesn't even bother me that much. They are a really good length - long, but straight so they fit nicely instead of hanging off of your hips.

author: Robin Orton
title: Great t shirts at a fair price
body: Purchased for my son.  This is the second set I have bought.  He loves them.  He is a big guy at over 6 ft tall and a body builder.  They are good to wear as casual but lightweight enough for him to wear under his scrubs.

author: dyingfool
title: good value
body: Colors and fit are as expected. Material is a bit thinner and lighter  than the same brand that i  bought from somewhere else ( very likely they’re from the different production line ) , but price here is a bit cheaper as well . Overall , For less than 5.00 per shirt, i have nothing to complain!

author: Aji
title: Better than expected (longer in length)
body: I was skeptical at first buying shirts online especially in bulk but I was surprised at the comfort and the length. The shoulder fits perfectly and the length was longer than expected which is what I actually wanted. I searched other reviews on this but never mentioned. Its long in the length than the average t-shirt so you can tuck in with ease and have it loose out fine too which covers more

author: Billie Jean
title: Great :)
body: Bought these for tie dying because I like a bit of a baggy shirt on me. They actually fit really nicely  on both me and my boyfriend (hes a size small). Nice quality and I love that they dont have tags. I might actually buy more of these again for lounging shirts.

author: AG519
title: Great shirts at a great price.
body: Love these shirts.They fit very well.  Tight fit for a more athletic body.  I’m 5’10’ 180 lbs and fairly athletic.  The large fits perfect and is tight in the chest and arms and a little looser in the belly.  A perfect fit as far as I’m concerned.They have washed well and retained good colour.Very happy with these shirts and would totally buy again.

author: Popcorn Eater
title: They shrink a lot but other than that, nice shirts.
body: I normally wear large t-shirts but after reading reviews about how these ones shrink, I ordered xtra large but they still shrink to a smaller size than a large t-shirt. Almost like they are two sizes smaller than what they say they are. The xtra large will shrink to roughly a medium sized t-shirt. They are nice shirts otherwise. I might trying ordering an xxl size next time if they are available. I even washed a new pack of the shirts in cold water and use very low heat setting on the dryer to see if that stopped shrinkage but they will still shrink after a few wash/dry cycles, even on very low heat settings.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Avoid this product
body: Shrank in the dryer. If I lose 10 pound and three inches, it’ll be a perfect fit. But I would never buy this brand again, having read an article in the Globe & Mail about how the exploit their workers in Haiti and Honduras by paying them starvation (literally) wages, and how any move towards unionizing is met with an immediate kick down the road. An immoral company That should be avoided. When a product is cheap, the worker pays the price.

author: Paolo Bramucci
title: Classic T-shirt!
body: I have long liked this brand. Their t-shirts are well made. The fabric is soft right from the beginning and over time with washing tends feel softer. The weight of the cotton feel just right.Also, the collar is sits a top the shoulders at the base of the neck perfectly. Moreover, even after washing it width remains wide at above 2cm (3/4 of an inch), which I find looks good when worn under an open collar shirt, such as a polo, or, button down Oxford shirt.With regard to the, I find that the small fits my small athletic body type well, that is close, but not tight or binding.As t-shirts go, this what I am looking for. I am a t-shirt and jeans guy, so these are very much my daily wear. They will easily last for 3+ years, if laundered as per instructions and continuing to look good.At the current price they are great value for the money.

author: mikey
title: Cheap quality and quality control is poor
body: I had a couple of shirts with the stitches not sewn properly at the sleeves and had holes in them and the material is not tight and created holes. I returned it for a refund and had a printing company print on t-shirts for a great price and they used fruit of the loom t-shirts with excellent quality control.

author: Vasko Obscura
title: Nice shirts
body: I've been wearing these shirts for about a year now and they are great. Fit well and they've held up so far. No complaints about these shirts I'll be buying more as this is my go-to shirt when filming YouTube videos. Hey Gildan you want to sponsor a video I wear your shirts in pretty much all my videos. Look up Vasko Obscura on YouTube.

author: Petal Joseph
title: Love It!!❤️
body: Purchased these for my husband. He loves them and so do I. (I recently purchased a second set). The material is cotton and it is a nice T-shirt. We got the medium size and it is not too close fit nor too large. I definitely recommend this product especially with its reasonable price.

author: Andrew Chappell
title: Was better before
body: Ordered these before, and they were thicker and better cotton. That's the whole point of ordering 100% cotton t's right? New place of manufacture, not as good as they were even recently.Updated Review. After one wear and washing I am reducing from 3 stars to 2 stars. Compared with the very same model item I purchased one year previously and have washed dozens of times, this is thinner, less weight, and smaller. Overall, cannot recommend.

author: KoolBreeze
title: I think the size chart is a little off
body: I am a heavy guy(290lbs heavy) and I ordered the largest size I could afford which was the XL because the XXL price rose up from 19.00 to 35.00.The shirts fit well enough but when I'm sitting the shirts rise up and it's annoying as heck. I hope they will stretch a little bit if they do then they will be the correct fit. Only time will tell and I will do my best to update this review if anything changes for the better or for the worse. For the moment they seem like a good deal.

author: Joe
title: A little tight but still comfy
body: I wear XL and ordered XL. I like them, they are not of exceptional quality but not too thin either. They fit a little tight compared to other XL t-shirts but they stretch well. They are kind of long but perfect if you tuck them in your pants. If you prefer a relaxed fit, my advice would be to go a size bigger.

author: Lisa D. Long
title: This is an indubitable and endearing product that screams quality and maturity
body: When i was a small boy, I learned that there is nothing more important than how you present yourself. When i bought these Gildan Men’s Crew T-Shirts, Multipack i only expected mediocre quality. However when i was trying these on for the first time, it was euphoric, it was like i was not even wearing a shirt. “All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.” ― Gandalf, this quote applies beautifully to the shirts, my life started to become better and clear again after purchasing these amazing Gildan Men’s Crew T-Shirts, Multipack. I was elected as the president of my local billionaires club, i started talking to more giraffes and overall, i just had a amazing time in these Gildan Men’s Crew T-Shirts, Multipack.TLDR: If you want to woo some chicks, and start dressing in a more civilized and fashionable way, i would strongly recommend the Gildan Men’s Crew T-Shirts, Multipack. Its just as fancy as a suit and you will look like a billion bucks. Thanks, much thanks. Live laugh love, buy Gildan Men’s Crew T-Shirts, Multipack

author: Gabriel
title: Perfect fit
body: These shirts fit great. Can never figure out if I should get a medium or a large. The reviews were helpful saying the medium fit a bit bigger so I went medium and was not disappointed. It’s a loose fit, but not too big. The arms length are just right and the length of the shirt is perfect. Not too wide at all.

author: Kyle Stegeman
title: Fits to your body shape
body: Good product I like the shirts they feel more cotton then anything. Also don’t expect the shirt to look like it does if your body is not shaped that way. What I’m saying is it fits whatever shape you are these shirts will not make you look fit if your not fit. Great pack tho.

author: Kelsie S.
title: Big but small
body: These shirts are great. Bought the large but was way too big, then bought medium fit perfect. A cold wash and no heat drying and still shrinkage!The large fits better still a tad big and the medium turned into a kid shirt 🤣

author: Spatch1971
title: Great value
body: Great deal!  Five t-shirts for 25 bucks...what’s not to like? I grabbed these primarily for use as a pajama top and they work great for that purpose.  But they’re a comfortable shirt that can be used as daily wear as well.  I’m 5’8 ,150 lbs and the medium is a perfect fit.  Even after a wash shrinkage was minimal and they remain a comfortable fit.  No complaints here.

author: Terri
title: Gildan Rocks
body: Cannot go wrong with a Gildan garment.  Canadian company and high quality clothing. My experience over the years with Gildan has been nothing but positive and it's nice to know you're getting a quality piece of clothing. Every. Single. Time. Keep up the great work Gildan 🇨🇦

author: Mark S
title: Rolling cuffs
body: Good product for the price I guess.  All the cuffs flip up when you dry them, which is annoying and looks bad.  What, do you expect me to iron my t shirts? I don't think so.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Gildans New Multipurpose Rag-Shirts!!
body: These shirts arrived quickly and fit great. I think the key to them is to NEVER WASH THEM!  Gildans plan must have been sell them in six packs so that by the time you have washed them all 3 times (and they are completely stretched and sacked out) you can’t return them! Waste of money.... unless of course you’ve always wanted a huge pile of rags, in which case Gildans New Multipurpose Rag-Shirts are for you!

author: Nancy
title: juste parfait !!
body: C'est exactement ce que je voulais , j'ai commendé des medium et il étais un peu grand mais apres les avoir lavés ,, ils ont rétrécis un peu étant donné qu'ils sont 100 % cotton et maintenant ils sont parfait , il sont bien ajustés et ils font super bien , le tissu est assez mince donc ce sera parfait pour travailler dehors cet été  , je peut dire que c'est un exellent achat et surtout a tres bon prix  , je suis vraiment content !

author: RH
title: Cheap undershirt, lightweight cotton
body: These are nice and lightweight, I would mostly only use these as an undershirt. I have used them as a generic work shirt, and even workout shirt on occasion. After a month of use, 2 of them had small holes develop, mostly likely from rough play with my dog. They will tear fairly easily, but its lightweight cotton, it will do that no matter what. Very comfortable.

author: Jayden
title: Easy, good shirts
body: I just needed some more inexpensive shirts to work out in, and these will be just fine. On first glance the only thing unexpected was the length, they're a bit longer than I would have liked, but I like my shirts quite short. They also shrunk slightly in the first drying. Very soft, excellent material especially for the price point. Would definitely recommend.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Pretty good deal but..
body: Don't get me wrong 6 shirts for 26 bucks is pretty good for the cost of shirts nowadays. But 2 minutes into putting one on my cat climbed up my back and ripped a hole right through one of them. My cat climbs up on most of my shirts and i've never had this problem. I just wish the material was more durable so they could last a while.

author: LJC
title: Great basic tees. Long lasting and comfortable.
body: Comfy basics for everyday wear. Good price for the volume of shirts.Soft but substantial (not like those fake vintage shirts that are super thin) these shirts are an everyday part of my workwear.They clean up well just with the washer and dryer. No shrinking, no falling apart with daily wear. Definitely will buy again in the future (not anytime soon, I have a dozen to work with for now!)

author: Daniel Marchuk
title: Fits small. If you wear a Large, order an XL.
body: Good quality shirts and the price is right. The fit however is small. I typically wear a Large and I definitely should have ordered an XL. The sleeves are also shorter than typical but this might be related to the small sizing.

author: Tyler
title: Great Fit
body: These shirts fit great and are a great alternative to big dollar form fitted shirts. I'm 5'11 and weigh 210 lbs and the large size fits incredible. Not to tight and not to loose, just the right proper fit. I loved these t-shirts so much that I bought an additional pack with different colour scheme.

author: Cody L.
title: New favourite shirts
body: Love these shirts. The large fit me perfectly at 6'4" ~200lbs.Even after washing a couple times, they still fit me perfect.I bought another pack and even plan to buy more as replacements for when these get too old.

author: Dave
title: These shirts ALWAYS feel like they're on backwards
body: They fit, material is fine, and I've never had this with another shirt but... these shirts ALWAYS feel like they're on backwards.  You put it on, think it's backwards, swap around, realize it's now actually on backwards, and go back to the original uncomfortable orientation.I do not recommend.  The fit is just weird in the upper chest/shoulders/collar which makes these shirts suck :(

author: im done
title: The size i got was an xl great fitting
body: Its affordable comfortable. The Gildan brand makes some pretty solid clothing at good prices. These shirts were the exact type of fit I was looking for as a 6' 190lbs dude who isn't as fit as I used to be these actually look great. Super comfortable. Would buy again. Great value.

author: KB
title: Shrunk - too small to wear
body: Initially I liked these shirts for work but after just a few washes in the laundry they have shrunken in length to the point where I cannot wear them. Quite disappointed now that I have 6 short shirts. If I buy them again I’d size up knowing they’ll shrink. I’ll look for another brand name

author: Amir A
title: Shrinks a lot
body: After washing them a few times and drying them with low heat they shrunk a lot to the point where I had to throw them out. Other brands don't shrink this much, I'm comparing to the other t-shirts that were in the same washer and dryer.

author: Bert
title: They made a mistake...
body: Shirts are actually pretty nice but it does say crewneck shirts and the last one in the bag is a stupid v-neck. Must of been a packing mistake. Now that i wore all of them except this one i don't expect ill be able to return them. I would rate it 5 stars if not that one of my shirt is not what i ordered.

author: Koko
title: Decent for the price.
body: I bought the size large black 6 pack.Fit pretty well though slightly smaller than other size large shirts I have, but not too small for me. Not the highest quality fabric but still reasonably soft. Comfy enough to wear to sleep in for sure. Can't really complain for the price! Pretty much what you'd expect.

author: Jeremy
title: Great Shirts
body: These have been my go-to under shirts for work for the last couple years.  They are very comfortable and I noticed the last couple times I have order them that they have changed the material blend to make them even softer.  Highly recommend!5

author: Martin Roy
title: Great purchase! Highly recommend. Will continue to buy.
body: Im 6 ft and 220 pounds, waist is 41inch, always struggling to find shirts that are long enough but not too long. These shirts were wonderful, fit nicely, great length, not too snug but not baggy either. That it comes with 5 shirts is great. For the price, I can see myself buying some more.

author: Zip002
title: Good under shirt
body: I think this t-shirt is good as under-shirt because it's kind of small, tight fit and light. It feels comfortable because its lightness. I can't comment on it's longevity because I just wore it a couple of times. There are questions about shrinkage and country of manufacturing. My is made in Honduras. I bought small size; the unwashed shirt is 30 inch long. After one machine wash and dry, the length is 28.5 inch.

author: Amazon Customer
title: A little too tight and they shrink in the dryer
body: For me, these shirts are only good when they are brand new or after maybe a couple washes. I noticed they sort of fade a little too quick and they get noticeably tight after putting in the dryer.

author: Michel Déziel
title: parfait, mince comme je l'est aime
body: les 2XL  sont ok pour moi si cela peut aider les autres je mesure 5'9" pour 200 lbs et j'aime cela lousse et pas épais pour l'été, donc cela répond a mes attente##### après un lavage 180livres maximum il devienne au max. des larges.OK APRÈS UN LAVAGE IL SONT TOUS PETIT

author: Angelo Melo
title: Get one size up from yours!
body: I had bought medium shirts before from Gildan & they shrunk & looked weird when I wore them, I just bought another pack & I bought large & they shrunk a bit but fit great! Buy one size bigger then yours & you’ll be fine

author: Miranda
title: WAY TOO THIN
body: WAY TOO THIN. You can see everything through them. Not what I was expecting for the price at all. $40 for 12 tees that are basically useless unless you send them as undershirts.Really disappointed. Wish I could return but really don’t want to go through the hassle.Won’t be purchasing ever again and I would suggest if you want quality - don’t waste your money with this item

author: Stephen
title: You get what you pay for
body: Out of the package, these shirts fit well. After one wash, they became pajama shirts. I only use cold water when I launder my clothes, and low heat when I dry them. They lost their shape and the sleeves and overall length got shorter. They now look as if I have washed them every week for a year.

author: jj6065
title: Good for layering
body: Ordered L for hubby who usually wears XL (6’4”, 42-43” chest, about 205 lbs). He loves them.  I don’t put much in the dryer (usually just towels) so these shirts have held up well in cold wash and then hung to dry.  The material isn’t thick so they dry pretty quickly on hangers.  Would buy again.

author: Heather
title: Fantastic Quality!
body: It's nice to find shirts made in North America and that are a great qualifying too! I bought these for my teenage son and he likes the fit and the feel of them. I liked the price and how well they washed too!

author: Natly
title: J'aurais  du prendre un taille plus petite c tres grand🤙
body: Pas chers mes prennez un taille plus petie il sont tres grand et tres long🤠Finallement quand il sont laver  il revienne a la bonne taille.Il sont mince parfait pour l'ete.🤽‍♂️

author: Anzo
title: Thin & cheap, but sometimes thats all you need?
body: I purchased these as work shirts, but unfortunately they are very light and thin material. Good as an undershirt maybe but they felt lacking in quality.As a cheap disposable shirt for those times when you don't want to get any nice clothes dirty; these will work perfectly fine. Be aware that after the first wash they get so cotton-fuzzy and will pick up absolutely all dirt/hair/fur/dust/etc. So don't expect to use them for any kind of professional setting that you wouldn't want to look like a human lint-roller.

author: Imgr8fulfor
title: If you need cheap t-shirts that you don’t care about, get these
body: This is for people who care about quantity and not quality. Considering the price, it’s okay but I personally would not purchase these again.I had purchased Amazon brand plain t-shirts and though it’s a few dollar more, IT IS WORTH IT.Just get Amazon branded t-shirts 👕 !

author: Jin
title: Cheaply made
body: You get what you pay for. Cheap pack - 5 shirts for $20. Therefore, quality is not good. Fabric is thin, i feel like it will have holes soon or when washed again. Stitching was terrible. A lot of thread hanging per shirt that i have to cut. Some stitchings are also not straight. Seems like no quality control for this.

author: Natasha Joy
title: happy with purchase would recommend
body: A little longer and more loose than expected but I feel after a wash they will fit really well and will not have to worry about too much shrinking. Worn very tall guy whp normally takes a medium but glad we went with large for that extra length. Material is a little thicker than anticipated but it seems to be for moisture wicking purpose

author: Sonny
title: Excellent Value
body: These are perfect for summer. And you can't beat the price. Bought 6. Wore and washed them all several times and there still commin outta the washer and dryer the same size and darn near as black as they were goin in. So I bought 6 more.6

author: Nick
title: Good tee's.
body: What can I say. Under tee's. Good value. I got 2 black, 1 grey, 2 light or Heather grey? Not sure thr proper color.

author: Stephen
title: Very Tight Around The Neck!!
body: You get what you pay for. Just spend a little more and you will be happy. This shirt chocked me around my neck the first time I try in on! The Hanes X -Temp is very good for the summer and the Fall & Winter the Amazon 100% cottonis very Soft & Warm. I have tried them all!

author: Keir
title: Good cheap shirts
body: I've o my tried 3 of the 5 shirts so far with no major problems. The first shirt had some extra thread coming off the bottom seam, but does not seem to be a unraveling problem yet. I would of liked maybe two more inces of length, but that's just a preference. The black shirt attracts dog hair a lot for some reason.

author: Jared
title: Good price for the shirts however won't buy again.
body: For the price you can't really go wrong but the shirts aren't that great. The shoulder seems are a little odd. The tightness around your waist and abdomen is a little tight. Maybe if you're a model with a 6 pack it would be a good fit. I'm 6'1 200 pounds with an average build. So take that into consideration.Won't buy again but I'm not upset with my purchase cause you get 5 semi decent shirts for a good price.

author: Maria
title: Check size chart before you shop...
body: By reading other reviews prior to my purchase... i figured these t-shirts would shrink a little.. I washed all 6 immediately in cold water.. and threw them in my dryer with all the other clothes. Yes, they shrunk about 10-15%  but to my perfect fit...  They are comfortable.. and I'm totally happy with my Amazon purchase.

author: Azzan
title: Fit perfect
body: I'm 6'3 with a slim build, and a medium fits perfectly, but if you would like them to fit a little tight I would recommend going a size smaller. Going a size smaller didn't interfere with the length, but just made the shirt tighter around my chest. Which is what I wanted. They are nice and stretchy, and when you wash them, they feel brand new. Would 100% recommend.

author: T Yates
title: Fits Great, but material is cheap
body: This product fits to the advertised size, but as soon as you get them out of the box you can feel that the material is extremely thin and cheap.  One of the shirts in the pack has a whole in it all ready after running it through only 1 wash cycle.

author: Jymmy yqb
title: Very very cheap
body: Material very very thin, good for summer, to look at, I usualy wear a large, but with this brand would have needed extra large, not made for heavy work, example mechanics, and I don’t think you could wear it as a dress t-shirt, because of the pandemic whe are in , I didn’t return them which I would have done in normal time

author: Pepe
title: Buy 1 size larger!!
body: Bought large and had to buy bigger i usuall use medium or large and had t buy xl t hirts are ok normal quality as you expect for this kind of t shirts they also really wrinkle after washing

author: Amazon Customer
title: Size is shorter than stated and they still shrink in the wash.
body: I bought these trusting the size chart, they were several inches smaller, and after a wash- they're completely useless to me.  They're very thin and the weave is very breathable so for humid, hot climates- they're great.  but the fabric is rather rough.

author: Sabrina Lavalley
title: As described
body: I bought these shirts because I needed plain black t shirts for work in bulk. The shirts are as described, and sizing Is accurate. I looked at women's black t shirts, but I am busty, and a little on the chubbier side, so I needed something both work appropriate, that isn't super tight on me. I am happy with this purchase, would recommend.

author: A Magana
title: They fit amazing and I am a returning customer
body: These shorts are honestly the best! I consistently have orders them since I discovered  the bulk pack on Amazon!I absolutely love it and can’t figure out why these fit me perfectly! I hate shirts that when I raise my hands up you can see my belly or when I bend down I don’t want anyone seeing my boxers! These are the absolute best for that issue and they are super comfy and perfect! Don’t dry them tho! Lol

author: Bill Haley
title: Fits an athletic build perfectly
body: These Tees fit perfect out of the package! I'm 5' 5" with a 40 chest and these tees look and feel great.I haven't washed them yet but I'm very happy so far.Bill...

author: Ben Ten
title: Perfect Shirt
body: These are probably the most comfortable t shirts I've ever worn. The quality is amazing on them and not having tags gets rid of itchy necks. These type shirts can easily be worn to events or just a relaxing at home.

author: Rachel
title: Its perfect
body: They fit really good, im a girl and find it hard to find modest tshirts for girls so i was looking for a longer bottom and high neck line with a good length sleeves.  It fit my expectation. I got a medium that fits me perfectly..but it will probably shrink since its 100% cotton .

author: bgc1954
title: I would buy again
body: Good quality material and high cotton content. Solid colours are 100 % cotton and two of the light grey shirts are 90/10 cotton/polyester. Solid colours are 2 black and 1 a dark grey/green sort of colour.  I think that is what is pictured. Gave 4 stars as I think the sleeves are a little shorter than other t-shirts I own but for the price I'm satisfied.

author: Daniel
title: Decent for the price
body: The shirts are decent. I bought large and I find they fit as a large in width and as a medium in length. One out of the ten is separating on the sleeve seem, maybe an inch, looks like a manufacturing defect. They aren't the softest shirts, I'm hoping that will change after a few more washes. I use them as work shirts to go under my coveralls, for the price I'm pretty satisfied and would buy again.

author: Chris Lahey
title: Delivery
body: I'll rate the clothes in a bit, but I want to first mention that the delivery service was . . . lacking. A beat-up car with the side window covered in plastic pulls in, tosses the package on the ground at the wrong address. Anyway...it's only t-shirts, but, still, it was my first drive-by delivery.Product itself is great.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Super comfy and soft, but came with a hole in one of them.
body: They do shrink alot in length, so if snug, do not put in dryer too hot or too long....or order one size larger maybe.Would recommend cause this is the only draw back and they are still much better than any other undershirts on the market.

author: jAMES tURNER  james turner
title: Good quality good fit
body: I ordered extra large as most tee shirts are tight, this one was not and next time I will order large. (to wear under a sweater or jacket). The extra large is so roomy and comfortable for daily working about the house. Very well made and very good value for money.

author: Mac82
title: Large fit, good value, buy it!
body: These fit a bit larger than expected but happy because could not beat the price. Bought to wear under formal dress shirts and could have gone down a size. Have stood up to a couple of washes fine. Cotton and nice weight without being too heavy. Will buy again. No problems with label mis-print as seen in one of the review photos.

author: Deborah K.
title: Excellent quality and fit
body: Hubby loves these tees! I’ve purchased several packs for him and he’s always happy when the box opens and he sees that he’s gotten more of his favourite T-shirts. They are high-quality, great fit and hold up wonderfully in the wash. Highly recommend!!

author: Z3PHIR
title: Too long & loose
body: These are way too long, I am not a fan of T-shirts that go down way past my waist and the material doesn't feel that comfortable.  Also, these felt a little baggy to be a medium when all my other T's fit perfectly.

author: Dave
title: Holly price jumped up by over 10 bucks
body: Came back to buy these a second time but the first wine they were only 26.99 and now they’re 38.99 and they were not in sale. The shirts are nice but NOT $40 nice.

author: TLC in Alberta
title: A little on the small side
body: Can't beat the price on these that's for sure.  Medium was a little small and they shrink a little more after the first wash. The material is one-half the thickness of a "regular" T-shirt sold by Mark's in Edmonton for $17 (with pocket). They are ok for wearing under a regular shirt though. Next time I will buy one size larger...can't beat that price --- 5 for the price of one...

author: M4ver1c
title: Excellent shirts! Worts every dollars.
body: Buy them! They are absolutely awesome. They are thick enough to keep you warm while not be overwhelming. The fabric is soft and solid and will be durable enough for years without having any holes. I will probably buy again one day to have more of other colors and will recommend to others.

author: Martini
title: Well made and cheap in price.
body: Very happy with my purchase.Was looking for cheap (in price) t-shirts for the gym.They look well made and i hope they will last a while.Anyway, at that price I can't complain much.I wash them a couple of time and they still look good.

author: Jojo J.
title: Good quality for the price and amount in a package
body: Hands down, some off the best shirts I’ve purchased to this date.. Xl fit me like a charm, slight shrinkage but definitely nothing to worry about.With other plain whit and Black T’s such as Hanes and or George I would only get to wear them once before washing and they’d shrink and turn into a belly shirt..these shirts don’t have that problem they’re a good length outta the package and lose next to no Length after washing. I bought theses shirts In Black and white, they’re a good quality and I’ll definitely be purchasing again. Difficult to say when as they fit perfect and are durable not to mention the amount that comes in a pack for the price has me set for a long while:)

author: Dennis R.
title: I prefer loose T shirts.
body: I like the cotton shirts. They tend to colour fade after several washes. Size up for loose fit. They shrink a little bit but the cotton feels good. Wash before use.

author: Gabriel de Paula Santos
title: Shrank from M to XS even following instructions
body: The shirt is awesome, but that only before you wash it. I’ve followed all the tag instructions and the shirt shrank from an M to a XS in the first wash. I don’t recommend it at all. In the picture you can see a new shirt compared to the one that I just washed.

author: NoSexAppealNeil
title: Great for anyone that doesn't want belly to show when you lift your arms
body: Love how long the shirts are but the black ones already have become stocky.Black ones suck but the other ones after a few washes are still nice and long

author: J Shap
title: AMAZING VALUE and I don;t have to leave the house  :)
body: These are great shirts.  I have now bought them every six months for the past 2 years and have a bunch of them since I like black shirts.  There are other colours.  They look great  fit great and the black colour hasn't faded at all.  Neck is comfortable and lays flat and none of them have stretched out.  Love these shirts!!!

author: Kristine
title: 3/5 are 100% Cotton, Other 2 are 90% Cotton/10% Poly
body: Fit roomy, but lengths different.  The 100% cotton ones ended up being just below hips, the Cotton/Poly ones stayed very long.  OK for at home, but not to go out.

author: Bruce Holmes
title: Wrong fit
body: I ordered a large in these, and it is almost like they are XXL. The size and fit is gigantic and does not seem to be true to the measurements. They were a gift so it is to late to return them, but if I could I would.

author: Dave
title: Great shirts 3 bucks each.
body: Nice quality shirt. Cheaper than stores. Neck is what I wanted doesnt show my chest. Going to buy the white ones as well, ordered black medium, slightly tighter than my regular medium shirts from canadian stores which isnt a negative as these are undershirts. I wear them as every day shirts.

author: Ace68
title: Good value.
body: wasn't expecting too much from these t-shirts, but was surprised that they’re not bad at all. The material is pretty soft feeling, which makes them comfortable. I don’t believe they shrunk too much, at least nothing really noticeable. I’m satisfied with this purchase and would recommend.

author: Craig R
title: In a Word... Perfect!
body: I ordered these t-shirts not knowing what to expect as I had never purchased nor worn Gildan crew t-shirts.I tried one on as soon as they were delivered and I couldn't have been more pleased. In fact, I was so pleased I immediately placed an order for a another pack of 6.

author: tanya
title: Overall not bad
body: Got these for my boyfriend to use as work shirts.. i even wear them sometimes.  The material isnt extremely stretchy or soft.  But i wasn’t expecting much for the $38 i spent.  Overall, pretty satisfied though

author: Jake
title: Great Product!
body: I ordered a pack of these because I wanted to attach some patches I ordered. True to size ( order your normal size, I went up one size because I’m always sceptical when ordering online) but it is a true size. Material is very comfortable and the shirt is a little longer then usual which I’m happy with because I am tall. Overall great product and worth the price, I will order again for sure.

author: Patricia
title: Great value!!
body: Fantastic value. They're just a perfect thickness. I was expecting really flimsy tshirts but was pleasantly surprised at the quality of these 100% cotton tshirts. I will definitely be buying more.

author: Shopaholic
title: Horrible finishing for each shirt!
body: I was quite disappointed in these undershirts because every shirt the thread is not cut.  At first I thought it was just on one of them but then realized it wasn't cut for every single shirt.  The finishing is very bad.

author: AR
title: Comfy Shirts! Fair Warning They Shrink 2 inches after your first wash!
body: I purchased 5pack multicolored 2XL.  Before washing they had a loose fit and fairly soft. After the first wash I noticed my Tshirts had shrunk approximately 2 inches.Still comfortable to wear, I noticed it fits comfortably but more like an XL after wash.  Stitching seemed to be good and no lose threads.Will have to see after a couple of washes how it holds up.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Rapetisse au lavage
body: Le chandail noir rapetisse énormément à la sécheuse, même à délicat. Au point d'être inutilisable. Les autres couleurs rapetissent aussi, mais beaucoup moins. On perd 2-3 centimètres sur la longueur.

author: Michael K
title: Shrunk a lot
body: I just recieved these, washed them, and found that they shrunk least one size.  I've purchased shirts from this company before in a different style and never had an issue. Truly disappointing as these will be rags now.

author: Seth Clark
title: Perfect as described but a bit big in shape but perfect in length.
body: I got this shirts for a couple of days now and they are perfect T shits I wear them for casual use one complaint is they're a bit big im 6'4 and 240 LBS and ordered the XL it is perfect length wise but a little bit too big in shape but I will still buy it again.

author: klm1780
title: Good fit
body: My husband needed undershirts for work. These were a good deal and are holding up well to regular use and washing. No yellowing, just not as bright white as original (which is to be expected after months of wear).

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good value for the money.
body: Shirts arrived quickly, decent weight cotton, colours as expected. Shrank a bit in the wash, still fit well. Mr is happy. Would buy again.

author: A customer
title: Shrinks a lot
body: Ordered a 2XL before being washed they were great fit. I would say they shrank about 2 sizes in the wash. Even washed on a cold setting to make sure and they still Shrunk.

author: Chillyfinger
title: Great basic T-shirt
body: It's time for me to toss out the worn T-shirts I bought at Walmart for $10 or $15 a pop. These are $5 each. They feel and fit just fine.I will certainly continue to replace my far-past-best-before-date underwear drawer with Gilden.

author: CJACK
title: Worst purchase ever I’d have returned if I could have!
body: I can’t believe the crappy quality of these shorts if two hadn’t already been worn I’d have returned!!! They all had different marks at first I blamed him but this one I pulled out and seen the marks first!!!! Horrible!!!

author: Melissa
title: Good for the price
body: Bought for my husband for Christmas. They are perfect shirts to wear at work. 5 months later they are still going strong with no rips. I say for the price they are totally worth it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Just got them yesterday ..and I like them
body: I like them , my initial impression is they are great deal..im XL they fit me XL, Im a big guy , real happy, gona get rid of all my old T shirt that has been hanging around

author: Antony Majid
title: Cheap and see through
body: Material is 100% cotton and feels very thin.. You can see straight through the shirt. They also fit quite loose.I bought these hoping I could pair them with another over shirt, but since you can see straight through the shirt its not even worth wearing. Cant even wear them by themselves

author: Sherrie   Lynn   Rhyno
title: Perfect fit 😜☺️
body: Could not of ordered a better pack of 5 men's t-shirts. Great price , but to be honest the shipping charge on everything l have ordered is alot from what the price of the clothing l have ordered. Just like the Dino slippers l ordered for my grandson back in December 2020 , for example the shipping price was ridiculous.  But l am happy other wise with my choices . Thank you.

author: Darren Moo Young
title: For me it fits well.
body: I loved the product. Just a tad bit tight at the arms. It rides up a bit if you got big arms like me. Lol. But love it. I wear them to work one a day for the week. Highly recommended.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great quality, nice comfortable fit
body: Using these shirts for laying about the house. Wanted a nice comfortable fit, and got it. Great quality.If I was wearing it as an undershirt to go out, I may have wanted a closer fit, but this works for what I wanted.

author: Brandon
title: Shrinkage
body: I loved these tshirt they were super comfy and everything was perfect the length went just pass the belt line arms were not tight in the pit area like most but when I washed them and by the way cold water no dryer they literally lost a size went from a LG to med so maybe I am gonna by an Xtra LG so when washed it will be a perfect LG because other then shrinkage I love the shirts and I have like 10 of them

author: jonathan kelly
title: cheap
body: These shrunk after the first wash and there a multiple shirts that are starting to have holes in them after only a handful of wears.  They are stretchy and tight. Would never buy these again.

author: Adam DeMeester
title: Used t-shirts sold to me
body: So I purchased in June 2020, just opened in September 2020 since I do not wear undershirts until it gets cooler outside. I was sold used, worn, smelly, t-shirts. No joke. Very gross. Of coarse, outside return time. But so gross.Update: Called Amazon and they are sending replacements at no cost.

author: Michael B
title: Very disappointed
body: Bought XL.  All shirts shrunk to smaller than a large after first wash.  Unwearable.  Sad to see such poor quality from Gildan. Sure it’s 100% cotton, but these wouldn’t fit my kids.

author: Liam
title: Worth every penny
body: I am very happy with this purchase. They are soft, lightweight, comfortable at a great price. The length of the shirts is perfect, and should be the golden standard for lengths. Mine fit very well at a medium size after washing (5'8 145-150lbs). They are thin but not see-through. I'd prefer if there was no black as it's harder to keep pet hair off but I love the greys.

author: Tommy C
title: Very good
body: These shirts are very good.These shirts are the only t-shirts I now buyThey are very durable, great value for your money.I recommend them.

author: Coleman Williams
title: Good work shirts.
body: I wear these as under shirts at work. Quality isn't AMAZING but it's alot better than other cheap shirts I've bought in the past. Not as much shrinkage either, which was a big relief. Solid shirts.

author: Mark Fox
title: Don't buy
body: I have a bunch of T shirts that I used once and washed and none of them fit. Doesn't matter how carefully you wash them. They are now useless and uncomfortable

author: Ansaree
title: Poor experience, poor quality
body: I’ve only had these shirts for a couple of weeks and the stitches are already tearing. Now I can’t even wear them - would recommend you buy elsewhere since the quality is poor.

author: Kinchy
title: Bang for your buck.
body: I know it's a men's shirt so I got a small, have purchased this item 3 times, sent a bundle to my mom. Great value for the price. It doesn't matter if it shrinks a bit for me cause they're men's sizes anyways- and I've washed them a handful of times and haven't noticed anything to complain about.

author: DBW
title: shrunk after first wash.
body: I bought these for my husband, I could have gone up about 2 sizes to an xxl for the fit because after the first wash they shrunk too much for him to wear comfortably. They are nice looking shirts, just too bad they stunk so much (washed as directed).

author: newuser
title: Very Basic shirt but shrank in size
body: Very Basic shirt, shrank by 40% in size after the first wash, and the short sleeves on some of the shirts also shrank so sleeve on right is shorter than on left. I prefer the Fruits of the Loom shirts on Amazon.

author: ML
title: Comfortable T-Shirt.  Good value for price.
body: This is a great T-Shirt.  Thickness and softness are good.  I've had better, but never at this price point, and it's more than acceptable.  I've washed them a few times now (on cold and hang dry) and there is no shrinkage.  I'll by them again.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good for the money.
body: Had to return first shirts they were to tight. This next size up much better. Great product for the money. Would sure be nice to see some of these products made back here in North America tho.

author: GEC
title: Shrinkage after cold water wash and recommended heat settings for drying, unacceptable.
body: Disappointed with these after first washing. Length shrinks way too much. I bought size 2XL and after I washed them right out of the package in cold water they shrunk so bad I use them once under a shirt and toss them into the garbage.Do not waste your money

author: Ryan
title: Surprisingly quality shirts
body: I didn't expect much at roughly $5 a shirt, but wow! These are very well fitting, soft shirts! Im 6', 190lbs, normally go with large, but went xlarge and after a run through the wash it's a perfect fit. Would buy again.

author: John C.
title: A good quality bargain!
body: Very pleased. I ordered a size bigger than I thought I'd need which worked out perfectly. 5 shirts for under $20 is amazing considering how nice they feel, and the quality is great too, no loose threads or anything.

author: andree france
title: Bonne qualité
body: J'ai acheté ses chandails pour faire de la peinture à tissu. De très bonne qualité,  confortable,  pour le prix ça vaut vraiment la peine.

author: Mansuit
title: Good shirts
body: These are great shirts. Perfect as undershirts or just on their own. My biggest pet peeve with t-shirts is when they have loose, sloppy looking necks. These don't have that. They look good and fit well.

author: Cesar Ruiz
title: Great Quality
body: I ordered a second set of these shirts as the quality and fit turned out to be better than expected.

author: E.B.
title: Shrinks
body: This product SHRINKS like crazy! After one wash you will have to use it as an undershirt only. It barely reaches my belt area after the wash. Before it was a good 2-3 inches below the belt line. I ordered a large.

author: Brenda-Lynn Morin
title: Great for women too.
body: Wonen shirts are expensive and made from thin material, these are perfect. I bought a pack of medium, equivalent to woman's large (fits 40 D),  I loved them so much that I ordered two more packs. Instead of getting two female shirts for 60$, I got 15 shirts.

author: Chris Belanger
title: Soft, cool/warm
body: Exactly what I would have hoped for in a t-shirt. Only thing was that one of the shirts had a little hole in it (the seamstress had tried to patch it but never quite got it right). But at $3.33 per, it wasn't worth complaining too much.

author: Tara Jackson
title: True to size, comfy
body: This is a great value pack for standard cotton shirts. I got a size large (5’8 200lbs) and it fits perfectly on me. The shirts were well packaged, easy to wash on cold settings and hang to dry. Will be buying another pack as this is great for staples in the wardrobe.

author: BarneyRubble
title: Frumpy but ok under a shirt
body: So these aren’t really the fitted dimensions you see on the pictures, the equivalent I guess would be more like those old school fruit of the look fit. They’ll do ok under a dress shirt but have a bit of an old school goofy fit. Not suggested for going out as the collar is thick and ‘underwearish’  and not on the thinner side like the pictures seem to hint ... a bit disappointed at how frumpy these look

author: Amazon Customer
title: Exactly what I want in a Plain T-shirt.
body: My wife got these for my for Christmas and i LOVE them. She knows i dislike shirts that ride up when i raise my arms and move around, so these are perfect to avoid that issue. They are a good quality fabric too.

author: Cristelle
title: Real Fur Magnet - Cheap quality
body: I have never seen such fabric catch fur so easily. It is hell with a cat! It says 100% cotton and I highly doubt it. It is too tight and I ordered L size! You can see through it as well... One wash and it was ruined with the fur from the other clothes!! Threw them after one use each... What's the point with all the fur sticking on even after brushing with a roll?!

author: Mikael Liboiron
title: Confortable, commandez une taille plus grande!
body: J'ai commandé une grandeur plus grande en considérant le shrink du lavage et tout est parfait! J'ai commandé des xl, je porte habituellement du large et un coup rétrécit c'est large et confortable!

author: Attatood
title: Good Product so far
body: These just arrived. Fast shipping. I tried one on and it fit as expected. I allowed for some shrinkage during the first wash. Seems to be of good material and the stitching looks good. I like the tagless feature. Now I will see how they stand up to my regular brand over time. Happy so far.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great tshirts
body: Bought a few pkgs. for my husband and 3 sons for Xmas. They loved them! Great fit sizes were as expected. No noticeable shrinkage after washing and drying.

author: Arman
title: An excellent, cheap T-shirt.
body: I have bought a pack of 6 almost 5 months ago. It is very soft and made of 100% cotton, so it didn't cause any discomfort on my sensitive skin. It doesn't turn colour quickly if you wash it regularly. Fit as expected. 5/5.

author: Ravel Jaswal
title: Gildan men crew t shirts
body: I needed some undershirts for work and came across these. The reviews were quite good and I had to try them for the price. I am very happy with this purchase as these shirts fit well and are made of good quality. I ended up ordering another set of 6 in different colors. You can wear them around the house, the gym, etc.

author: fortin
title: Bonne qualité mais trop petit
body: Normalement le 2X large me fait, mais pas chez cette marque, mon voisin a bien aimé et parfaitement ajusté pour lui.

author: Chris Jamieson
title: Fit is fine, price is right, quality is not what I remember
body: 2 of my 5 shirts already have popped seams in the armpit area. These shirts are not a tight fit, and I'm not an active person (mild/no wear and tear).. Gildan is certainly not what it used to be in the past. Would not buy again.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great fit and comfortable
body: Great fit

author: Adrian
title: Great fit. Quality better than expected.
body: One of my favorite fitting t-shirts. Actually long enough for once, t-shirts are never long enough for me. Material is nice, at the price, surprising. Will buy again.

author: Ryan D
title: Absolute crap - DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY.
body: You get what you pay for with this product - I'd recommend to spend your money on a different brand. Although the price is relatively similar to other shirts on the market, these are far inferior in terms of quality and feel. After one wash, they completely lose their shape, never feel soft and even shrunk. More bizarre, its like these shirts are made so LONG in the torso, it bunches up if you tuck in!  Likely Gildan found great savings by reducing quality of the cotton they use. Either way, buyer beware - don't buy this crap.

author: Serge
title: Un t-shirt pour multiples occasions.
body: Peut-être manque-t-il un peu de longueur,moi je m’en sers pour mes dodos. L’été un petit t-short mince,solide,pas trop ample,ou l’hiver quand les nuits sont à 0 à-5 degré,pour moi c’est parfait.

author: Selena
title: Good value
body: Pretty good for the price, did shrink a bit in the was but that was expected

author: Amazon Customer
title: Confortable
