body: Je suis allergique au matériel des étiquettes et ces t shirts n en ont pas; en prime ils sont super confortables, il ne me reste plus qu en commander d autres,” je les aimes “.

author: kgc
title: Nice and soft
body: Soft cotton feel, fits well. Feels a bit thin but I think I rather this than thicker gildans. Good value for the money.

author: Aristophanes
title: Cheap
body: These are not the same quality as the Gildan's I bought from a street retailer. These are cheap and too small. Not worth it. No value.

author: Kurt
title: Good T-shirt, fit on the smaller side
body: I usually wear a medium t-shirt (5'10", 170 lbs), but this one was a little bit too small for me. Quality was very decent though, especially considering the price.I bought this for a tie-dye project with my students, worked great.

author: Robin Dei
title: Son loves these
body: bought these for our 17 year old son who likes basic shirts and he loves them. Would order more and the quality is pretty good. Not too thin at all.

author: Don W.
title: Don't buy.
body: The cotton is terribly thin.  Washing twice and I ended up putting them in the rubbish.  Badly made, poor quality, they lose their shape.  Kirkland is far superior.

author: ReyQC
title: Threads everywhere
body: After only one wash, 3 out of 5 shirts have long threads coming out of the arm pits...Holes are coming... quite deceived.Other than that, everything is fine, a little on the larger side than i’m used to when ordering a medium.If not for the threads, they are worth 5 stars

author: Terry Dillon
title: Shrinks considerably
body: Fit quite  well until I washed it. Shrunk considerably from large to medium. Now is too short and too small.

author: Jay
title: Attn:  Ladies
body: Size chart shows ladies sizes.  fyi:  If you would be a size small according to chart, this will give you a close fitting top.  If you prefer loose, order the medium. Medium slightly larger & fits loose not sloppy.  Feels nice on.

author: Gia George
title: Soft material
body: Its not long-lasting with machine wash as i vould find some holes now after 3 months of use.but the material is soft and comfortable. Liked it and will recommend.

author: michel bourdon
title: Rapetisse énormément si séché à la sécheuse.
body: Rapetisse beaucoup une fois passé à la secheuse.  Après avoir passé à la secheuse, un XXL est devenu la grandeur d'un L.La qualité est pas au rendez-vous pour le prix. Je suis vraiment déçu.

author: Dave
title: Decent shirts for work!!
body: These shirts are pretty decent and a good buy for the price.I wear medium shirts and these seem to run a tad bit on the smaller side. The sleeves could be longer. But overall money well spent.Purchased these for work and are holding up great so far!

author: Étienne
title: Great fit but some threads coming appart
body: These are comfortable and the fit is good, not loose not too tight. Comfortable. The reason I gave 3/5 stars is that on some of the T-Shirts the stitching on the arms and bottom are coming apart. Maybe a bad batch?

author: Savannah
title: Comfy
body: I bought these for my husband for around the house, but they are so comfy, and look really good that he wears them as everyday shirts! Well, when I haven’t worn them all. (Seriously comfy!!)

author: duane rocks
title: Great quality T-shirt!
body: I love the quality that is Gildan as I've been buying and wearing these shirts for years and hold up well as I still have some from over 10 years ago that I purchased at Costco!

author: Jack
title: Not the best
body: I found these kind of scratchy and a bit stiff, even after a wash. I think it's because they're 10% polyester, which I hadn't noticed in before ordering. They're also a little tight in the armpit, and the black already looks a bit faded/cheap. Sadly they're not as comfortable or good-looking as other basic brands, like Uniqlo or George.

author: Mrs. Average
title: It’s 6 plain white T-shirts
body: Good value for the price.  T-shirt material is a bit cheaper.  Thinner than what I expected.  They have to be hung up or folded right away hot out of the dryer or they wrinkle really bad.  What else can I say.....it’s 6 plain white T-shirts for a good price.

author: Joana
title: The best basics out there
body: I've been looking for some basic shirts for a while now to wear either while going out or just at home. Usually when you buy from well known brands they are kinda expensive but Gildan shirts were just perfect. The material was better than I expected and they didn't shrink after washing, which is a problem that I've been experienced before.Overall, I would suggest these shirts to everyone.

author: Ray Smuckles
title: Decent shirts at good price
body: You get a lot of shirts for not a lot of money.  They aren't the greatest t-shirts, but I find most white tees have a pretty short lifespan anyways, so no point in spending $20+ on a single tee.  Fit pretty well and quality was decent enough.  No complaints.

author: Viesta
title: Kinda thin
body: Its not bad for the price. But I wish that it’s a bit thicker… it feels like it won’t last a few washes

author: omar
title: A good buy.
body: Nice t-shirts, very good price.

author: digriat
title: Fits perfect, appears to be good quality after 4 washes
body: Really happy with these. They fit as expected and appear to be good quality after 4 washes. Kinda wish I got the choice of colors though, but the assortment came with 2 light grey, 1 medium grey and 2 black and I'm good with that. Ordering it again now.

author: Mike from Canada 🇨🇦
title: Good and cheap. Well made. No issues.
body: I’m kinda skinny. 6’2”. 180lbs. i bought larges. I think these shirts fitted nice. No loose threads or anything. Just normal shirts. Do not put them in the dryer! They will definitely Shrink. I put one in by accident, and now it definitely fits like a medium.

author: Ken S Habby
title: You get what you'd expect
body: You're going to get what you're looking for if you're ordering these shirts. I'd say the fit is a bit on larger side. My only gripe is the grey and black are doubled. Why not throw in a few other colours?

author: D & M
title: Shrinkage
body: Ridiculous. They're shirts fit great prior to washing. I washed, in COLD, and they shrunk to at least a medium. I truly don't believe anyone on here with reviews that they don't shrink at all. Lies.

author: Olivier
title: Taches rosatre sur 3 chandailspq00
body: Jai recu le bon nombre de chandail et tres confortable mais je vien de me rendre compte que 3 des chandails on des taches rosé dessus comme leau de javel mais en spray. 3 sa fait bcp considerant que je ne peux pas les porter pour sortir de la maison

author: sue
title: excellent product
body: the fit is spot on. They are a, generous size, and they wash up nicely with little or no shrinkage, and are colour fast so safe to put in a dark wash. Overall it is an excellent product.

author: Guillaume-Marc Caza
title: 5''10 , 185 pounds / Decent fit
body: I'm 5''10 , 185 pounds. I have decent shoulders on me. Took the large ones.They fit well and complement my build.I like those T-Shirt. Comfortable, easy to wash. Nothing incredible on the style, but this aint why you are buying them.

author: Terry Tae Hyun Kim
title: It's a good set of shirts, but
body: Grey colors are good, but black ones gather house dust so easily. I need another set of grey colors.

author: Honest Reviewer
title: Longer than in the past
body: Third time ordering, past two orders fit perfectly but for this last one, the shirts were about 1 1/2” longer. Quality seems about the same.

author: Tyler the enslaver
title: Great deal
body: Perfect size great for work shirts don’t mind getting it too dirty/greasy.  I have quite broad shoulders and large biceps and this fits snug but very well.

author: Mix views
title: Good fit and quality
body: Decent quality at a great price. These are the second items ihave bought made by Gildan and am impressed with the fit and quality. I will definately buy more of their products.

author: Greg
title: Great Shirts
body: What can you say, there t-shirts, but they fit and wear very well. Not cheap shirts for the lower cost!!I highly recommend.

author: shawn
title: the length is a little to long but fits alright.
body: I'm 5 foot 11.5 tall on paper and my weight is unknown. The shoulders were a bit loose and the shirt is a little to long. I generally order and XL and due how it fits going down a size isnt an option because it fits fine in the chest and hip area.

author: Jay Jansen
title: Doesn’t fit as described.
body: Doesn’t fit as described.  Length is fine but generally too loose.  I’m 6 feet and almost 200 lbs and pretty slender.  I feel like a medium might work if it weren’t for the length.

author: Melinda lukacsi
title: Amazing
body: Have twins 18 , about 200 lbs each.  This fits true to size,  comfortable,  doesn't shrink in wash.  Great buy

author: Kuba
title: Good for the price
body: T-shirts are good. Nice cotton, fit well. They shrink a bit on the first wash however.Perfect for lounging around the house, getting dirty or sweaty, or being a bum. Lol.Ketchup stains wash out well,

author: Nancy
title: confortable
body: j'ai pris des large mais j'aurais du prendre des médium car ils sont un peu grand mais c'est pas grave je les garde quand meme , ils sont confortables et la longueur est parfaite , je mesure 5 pied 10 et pese 175 livres

author: cb
title: not the best to last
body: if you are looking for T shirts that will last and keep the original look, after only few time in your washing machine be ready to end up with old Tshirt look .....but to wear while working  when the look is not important, great price !

author: Bushman
title: Best shirts you can bu
body: These are so great, that i re ordered two more packages. Excellent fit and quality. Everything else I had is now gone. These are a great buy!!!!

author: ShirlieBenko
title: Soft and great fit
body: These t shirts are not luxurious but they are a good fit for a shirt under a blazer if you do not want a logo.

author: Aj
title: perfect undershirt for my work
body: use these as undershirts for my work and they are comfortable and fit great, occasionally Ill wear them as a regular t-shirt if I'm stepping out of the house for a quick errand.

author: Itsme_Aliy
title: Okay
body: The first time I washed them, the threads at the bottom of the shirt came undone and left all my clothes tangled in the thread, I had to use scissors to get them untied. They shrunk allot after a the first wash.

author: Stremblay82
title: FITS SMALL
body: Purchased two packs of Medium shirts. The shirts fit like an extra small out of the package. After one wash they’re in the trash.

author: Oxenfree
title: Love them and they shrink a bit.
body: My medium t shirts were getting too restricting during workouts, so I bought this 5 pack in size large. It did not disappoint.Perfect relaxed fit out of the pack, then after first wash they essentially became fitted t shirts. I would buy again.

author: Brian Kretz
title: Good fit
body: These are really nice shirts. They do shrink after washing, like every high quality cotton shirt will. If you are buying to wear as a regular shirt you might consider going 1 size up. The XL fits me perfectly for an undershirt.

author: S
title: Great Cost-Effective Shirts!
body: Boyfriend loved them, especially the darker grey colour. They fit him really well, they're decent quality, and the price is right. :)Hopefully adding weight/ height helps someone out — I know he appreciated it!

author: Janet Grieves
title: mens undershirts
body: I was amazed at the quality for the money spent.  It was a great value, washed up well, fits well.  The size guide was spot on. Definitely would recommend this product.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great shirt, fits to size, no shrinkage.
body: Great shirts. We got these for my husband to wear to work. They are comfortable and easy to wash. No shrinkage in the wash. They fit pretty much to size and are a great value for the product.I will definitely purchase these again.

author: trevor
title: Relaxed fit
body: Im a 5’8 and 165lbs and size M is relaxedRecommended for sleeping or around the house.You can’t beat the price, really comfortable and black color could be used outdoor.

author: Kim P.
title: Bonne qualité
body: J'ai acheté ces T-Shirt pour un ami hospitalisé et c'était parfait.  Bonne taille, bonne coupe et tissu de qualité qui ne se déforme pas au lavage.  Je le recommande.

author: rick
title: Love these t's
body: A bit tight once washed as can be expected for a fat bald guy . I big and beautiful with an amazingly fluxuating body well chubby on top of He-man like muscle with resting bitch face to match ant the beard of Oden himself .So go ahead and buy these t's 20 bucks is 20 bucks and you don't get much fer that these days !

author: Rawhatul Hoque
title: Fits as expected but will shrunk
body: Shrunk to down almost a size, bought two sets from Gym and to wear inside shirts.Returned both of them.Fit was great and so was the fabric.

author: Dave
title: The t shirts are very comfortable.
body: No complaints. They are made of cotton so you can expect them to shrink a littlle .Size chart is right on.Satisfied with the t shirts.

author: TK
title: Not at all slim fit like the photos suggest.
body: You need either a gut, a barrel chest or both to fit these.  I'll wear them to sleep in but at 6' 165lb they fit too loose around the mid section.

author: SolidNEIN
title: Good value
body: I'm 5 foot 5 so it's too  be expected this shirt is long on meBut everything else if really good

author: CandiceH
title: Very well made. Comfortable and soft
body: I work with dirty tires all day. This just helps hide the dirt a bit better than a lightener shirt. The fit is so comfortable and shirt is soft. I even kept one for sleeping in I like it so much

author: Vikas T.
title: Good quality. Buy it.
body: Fits well. Feels strong and not see through or cheap like other t-shirts. This one actually looks and feels like a t-shirt and not undershirt.

author: Far Zad
title: As expected
body: Used to wear Medium. But after the last order and this order, I found out they have shrunk the sizes. My old Mediums still fits and now I have to order large. Go figure. This batch (L) fits well.

author: SP
title: Buy Marks modern fit stretch shirts
body: To short and dress like type if you want a real shirt that fits amazing and doesn’t shrink go to marks and get their Denver Hayes modern fit stretch 95% I cotton 5% spandex is a nice blend of material and they are below the belt with a nice snug fit from chest to bottom

author: Alex
title: Great value, $5CAD per shirt.
body: At 5$ per shirt, it's a great buy, nothing fancy, just plain single colour shirts that fit as expected.

author: s0ma
title: Unbeatable value
body: I Gotta say, for the price you can't really go wrong. These are your standard tshirt. They aren't paper thin so they are thick enough to wear as just a regular tshirt. Fit is JUST SLIGHTLY small. They will shrink in the dryer. I bought these for the gym and they are great

author: Tammy
title: Size Up!
body: Great quality shirts for affordable price, however, size up from your normal! 2XL fits more like 1XL.

author: A. Customer
title: Doesn't match with description or picture.
body: In the picture it shows the shirts are long enough compared to width. However, I feel like I am a round person when I wear it. I need XL shirts and the ones I get from local shops fits properly. At least doesn't make me look round! It feels like this product is just a piece of rounded cloth with neck & hand holes in it.

author: Lazy
title: Sa dépanne
body: Avec cet marque vous ne devez pas vous attendre a de la qualité tissus très mince , et lorsque vous le séché a la machine sa se rétrécit, j'ai pris L, qui devient du M avec le temp ( donc si ses pour vous dépanner allé d'y a fond si vous recherchez la qualité nop vous l'aurez pas ici ...

author: Jamie
title: Cheap.
body: Great work shirts for my boyfriend. Was cheap and will repurchase when he wrecks them all again. Haven't had any issues. The fit was as expected.

author: Jordan H. Green
title: Very Comfy Everyday Under Shirts
body: Nice under every day undershirts. I like my undershirts to be loose but not too big and these fit just right.The material is top quality as is the stitching.Very comfortable, breathable and good for everyday use.

author: Steve
title: Good as hanes
body: They fit just like any large hanes t shirts. Cheaper and just as good. I use them as work shirts, and I'll be buying more in the future

author: shane
title: Solid shirts for tall guys !
body: I’ve always had issues with my shirts - I am 6’4” , 190lbs, broad shoulders- these shirts fit perfectly / they don’t hang out on backsideI will be buying these again. Great product

author: Stewart
title: Will shrink when dried
body: For the price they're. But I would not buy again or I would buy a size bigger they shrink so easily as always.

author: Kellan
title: Thicker material, but soft and not stiff.
body: 6'1/204lb got XL. They were a little large to begin with, but have shrunk into a nice fit (very Slightly oversized now). Material is soft, it's on the thicker side, but it's also not stiff. Good work shirt in the shop.

author: David Johnston
title: Shrinks 2 sizes in wash
body: T-shirts shrink, that’s part of life. These things were so poor in material that they shrank by 3 sizes and became a belly shirt after one washing.  Absolutely terrible, do not buy.

author: Allan
title: Disappointed!!!
body: The actual product looks nothing like the picture on amazon.  XL fits like XXL.  When I tried it on it felt like I was wearing a garbage bag.  I'm a big guy, 6foot 3inches to be exact.  This is why I hate buying stuff online.  You never know if what you see in the picture is what you're actually going to get.

author: Andrew Weisler
title: Excellent Quality.  Superb fit, Durable.
body: The Shirts arrived on time as expected.  Perfect fit, And the quality is much better than the box stores I use to purchase from.I will be ordering more.  Thank-you.  Andrew, Guelph, Ontario

author: Martin Carmichael
title: Rapetisse au lavage
body: Rapetisse au lavage donc pas mettre dans sécheuse on perd 2 pousse de longueur après un lavage et séchage

author: Alecia
title: Soft, true to size but long!
body: Such great value for the price. Only complain is that the shirts are long, even on an average height guy. Good thing is you can just kind of bunch it up over jeans and no one would be able to tell they are longer than most shirts. Very soft.

author: John of Hampton
title: Fit Nice Before Washing
body: They fit nice before the first wash, then they shrink. I like long t shirts so I don't have plumbers but. But after the first wash, well so much for that. And I ordered X large.

author: Buddy!
title: Will buy more once these wear out for sure
body: Bought these for work. Got sick and tired of ruining my nice shirts at work. The fit great and feel great, but i think the fabric is warm. Still 5/5. Not so hot in the fall

author: Johnathan
title: Cozy
body: Nice shirts. I've been bumming around the house in shirts over 10 years old lol. Finally got some shirts that are cozy and nice for around the house. I ordered a size bigger knowing I was drying them and they shrank to just above a MM.

author: Tiffy Gee
title: Poor quality
body: Very poor quality even for undershirt. I find it soooo stretched out that its not even close to being the size that I got. Had to return.

author: Laptop Retrospective
title: Does the job
body: Cotton isn't as soft as I would have liked but perhaps with more washes that will change. If you like your undershirts a little stiffer, nothing wrong but my other shirts have a slightly better next to skin feel.

author: DelDel
title: Will buy again!
body: Im a girl, I ordered a pack to use around the house and as pjs! The material is just perfect! The fit is amazing and I love it!

author: Lloyd
title: Colored t-shirts needed badly.
body: Received 5 colored shirts.  Neutral colors.  Fit just right. Package was delivered 12 hours early.  I'm happy with the price also.  I am going to shop with Amazon again.  Easy app to use makes it easy to shop for goods.

author: ShepLegal
title: Surprisingly impressed.
body: For amount you pay, value is great, quality is great. I would buy the 5 pack again. Fits true to size on my husband who wears a large. Will buy again.

author: Marc
title: Incroyable
body: Pour le prix j'espérais pas recevoir quelque chose d'aussi bien. Première fois que je commande des hauts sur internet et je suis vraiment pas déçu! La qualité est robuste, et la coupe me va comme un gant!

author: Butterfly26
title: Happy Customer
body: Bought this for my husband. He really likes them. The size was right on. Says they are comfortable and fit great. I will definitely be purchasing them again.

author: sue
title: T shirts
body: It's hard to find a t shirt that is long enough so when you bend over you back doesn't hang out. These one cover everything and my husband think they are the best

author: Soundman
title: WONDER SHIRTS!
body: These shirts are just terrific. They are well made and durable, great for everyday wear and function. They are also thin enough to function as a light undershirt. The price can't be beat, and the tagless neck is a definite bonus. I couldn't be more pleased with these shirts! Go shirts!!

author: S
title: Un bon assortiment de t-shirts à bon prix
body: Grandeur parfaite pour moi. Bon ajustement à tous les endroits. Ni trop ajusté, ni trop lâche. Coton de bonne qualité. Coutures qui semblent solides. Je suis satisfait.

author: elmer lagman
title: perfect fit when new..after 6 washes the shirt became loose
body: fitting is right or true to size,materials are good and comfy, I use it as my undershirt at work over all this is a great shirt on a reasonable price only thing is after 6 wash it was loose but still ok for me as I said I use it for undershirt only

author: Hawk
title: happy ith these t-shirts.
body: I bought a larger size because I would be wearing them as a work shirt not for underwear.  They are nice and heavy and wash well.

author: Norberto Sousa
title: good shirts
body: I ordered these shirts to go under a dress shirt or sweaters, fit just right and good length on me, I'm 5'10 and 180 lbs and I ordered large and it fit just right, my next order will be grey size Large again.

author: lilyk
title: Nice shirts, but didn't fit
body: My husband is a true M in tee shirts and these were too loose. The quality is good, so its disappointing that they don't fit - will order again if they have a smaller size.

author: Mary-Michèle Pelletier
title: Order one size up
body: The size was ok before I washed them, they shrink a lot. I am 5 foot nine 138 pound. And  small is too small. Should have ordered medium size.

author: Dennis R.
title: Buy size up for loose fit.
body: I have been using this brand for more than a year. Comfortable and well made.

author: Darren Lockhart
title: Good value, a little tight on the neck
body: Good undershirts shirts, great value. I find the neck a little small. It’s likely fine for most people, I just don’t like shirts being tight on my neck.

author: Rafael Steil
title: Good enough
body: Considering that each shirt cost $4 (5 for ~$20), this is a decent deal. It fits better than other, more expense shirts that I tried in several occasions. However, don't expect a soft touch - it fells a little rough. But overall, you get more than you pay for.

author: Jonathan Audy
title: Très bien pour le prix!
body: Après plusieurs lavages ils sont toujours intact. Je ne les met pas dans la sécheuse par-contre! La taille que j'ai commandé respecte ce que je porte de d'autres marques.

author: Stephen
title: As expected!
body: Got these for my stepdad who goes through tshirts quickly. They fit as expected, soft and good quality. Came quickly. Impressed.

author: melissa
title: White shirts in bulk
body: Ordered these to iron on printed images into them to sell to the public. These are soft and excellent for that purpose. Great price for bulk. Arrived ontime.

author: Roberto
title: Shirt bundle
body: Overall a good quality and comfortable shirt. Need more color options but a good purchase.

author: mr salty
title: Very light
body: Disappointed-- very light material.  Not happy , was expecting  heavier material  like pennman or hanes !

author: Ashley Brown
title: Decent shirts. Great value!
body: Amazing value for these shirts. Bought this for my boyfriend.  They fit him nicely! He's 6 ft tall, 175 lbs, and wears a large.

author: William OR Kristine
title: Good Shirts
body: Great shirts for the price. Ordered the large so they are slightly loose, which is fine as I’m wearing them for work (manual labour job).

author: E.J.A
title: First Order was Better the Second!
body: This is the second time I order these shirts... first batch I ordered were Great!!! Thick and the fit was Excellent!! The Second batch I ordered were not the same.  The material was thinner and they felt a lot cheaper then the first ones I bought. The shirts are a great value and hope next order I get the material is as good as the Frist time.

author: DKRP
title: They shrink by 2 sizes
body: We bought a bigger size and they just shrunk inspite of that too. We bought a large and now it's smaller than a small.We have use them now that we have washed them already.

author: C.W.Newsham
title: Okay shirts
body: The shirts are okay, but for the money Walmart $6 T shirts are softer and feel like better quality. I don't think I'd buy these again.

author: Kim Perrin 😷
title: This package of 5 t-shirt 👕 is just what I needed
body: These t-shirt 👕 are assorted.They should last a long time.Good place to know where to get more.

author: Jonathan
title: Bon rapport qualité prix
body: J'utilise ses chandails pour le travail et j'adore en raison du prix très bas et la qualité du tissus. On s'entend ce sont des chandails légés, moi j'adore après ça dépend de chacun.

author: hamdi
title: Great price for the bundle and would buy again
body: Ordered these shirts as a blank canvas to design them with vinyl and paint. Material is kinda thin but the weather is getting warmer and won’t be an issue. Plus, we’re stuck at home for the most part and it doesn’t bother us at all (thinness of the shirt and not the qtime 😩lol)

author: Joanne
title: wouldn’t buy again
body: shrunk terribly and now all to short to wear.  wasted my money

author: Kindle Customer
title: Perfect size
body: This shirt was perfect we used them to make tshirt designs with fabric paint.  The shirts were soft and stayed soft even after washing!

author: Monique Beauregard
title: Confort et facilité d'entretien
body: Je les ai achetés pour un monsieur âgé qui souille toujours ses encolures. Facile à laver avec les couleurs grand teint.

author: Willy
title: Rough and large, do not recommend
body: I do not know what kind of softness does the Premium US Cotton got, but the fabric of these T shirts is extremely rough. About the fit, it runs large. Will not buy again.

author: Lance
title: Good as an Undershirt
body: Relatively soft but feels on the thin side. Good as an undershirt but not as a T Shirt. Not plush  enough, thick enough or soft enough to wear as a T Shirt. Delivery took almost 4 weeks.

author: H S
title: Shirts lost their shape in single wash
body: Not sure if the set I ordered was defective, but I just washed them a couple days ago and they all lost their shape. The started off a good fit when they went in. Now they're all stretch with material peeling off from the ends...Unfortunate timing as the 30-day return window just passed as well...

author: ryan mouzas
title: Awesome shirts but collar is very thicc
body: Really nice shirts, however the collar is very thick and looks kinda odd if you intend on wearing these as a shirt like me. They do go just past my waist (I'm 6') and fit really nice.

author: Ka Shing Cheung
title: Medium is a bit too large
body: Can't complain because of price, but it could definitely fit a bit better. I use it as undershirt anyways so people won't be able to see that this medium size shirt goes mid thigh (I'm 178cm tall).

author: Bob N
title: Love them, Better then expected,
body: At this price point I wasn't expecting much but I'm very happy with them, far better then expected. Fit great and I would definitely order again.

author: Steph
title: Awesome shirts
body: Arrived on time and I would go a size up for anyone if you wash these shirts they will shrink in dryer would recommend going a size up.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great product
body: This was my first time purchasing Gildan's t-shirts, and will not be my last time purchasing.  Good quality, and value for my money.  They fit as expected.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Defect in one shirt
body: Unfortunately one of the shirts had a RIP. Otherwise arrived on time. I'll use it as a pyjama I guess. Dont feel like making a return.

author: David33
title: Not worth the $$
body: Cheap feel, gets deformed easy, doen't fit body well, collar too tight.... just go to costco, kirkland shirts are astounding!

author: Cher
title: Shrunk after 1 wash
body: They fit percent until they were washed. They shrunk and now theyre too short to wear

author: Rockieshopping
title: Good quality for price
body: Product fits tru to size and is good quality. Fast shipping. I just received today and already ordered again. For less than $5 a t-shirt, this was a great buy.

author: Evan M Hera
title: Don't know what I was expecting
body: Was looking for more a workout shirt, but these shirts are more for one time art projects, not really good for working out, disappointend,

author: TJames09
title: Great value
body: Hard to beat the value. I use them as undershirts for work and its a nice material. The fit is as expected. They arent to big or to small. If your looking for a "fitted" look you might need to go down a size.

author: Leo Beaudoin
title: Great Price
body: I bought these Gildan shirts for work as they are very comfortable and last a long time.  They fit as expected and are very reasonably priced when buying in bulk.  I'm happy with my purchase.

author: Ann
title: Good stuff
body: Fits perfect. Measured my son and followed the size guide. He likes his tees plain, and without graphics, so this was perfect for his wants and needs.

author: Der Sammler
title: Super T-Shirts!!
body: Superbe t-shirt! Cotton parfait pour les personnes qui ont chaud, pas trop épais. Tres belle longueur et SUPER prix! (6.80$ du t-shirt)Vraiment tres satisfait :)

author: Ray Doback
title: Very smooth, and last longer
body: Last long if you not wear them all day. Very smooth, the colors are not degrading.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good shirts
body: Good t shirts just a bit too small so get a size bigger then usual

author: And after using a product for at least a month?
title: They don't fit anywhere near whats shown in the picture.
body: I like a tighter fit around the chest and arms ....I'm definitely bigger than the guy pictured and the arms of the shirts I got have a about 2 inches of loose material!

author: Canaille
title: Un peu long
body: Vraiment satisfait de ses chandails. Prix incroyable. Bonne qualité. 100% coton.Seul point négatif est qu’il sont un peu long.

author: Carl
title: Amazing value.
body: Fit nicely.Not the softest fabric but at about 5$/shirt, I can't complain.No defect found on the shirts.

author: istvan z
title: Worst shirts of my life
body: The shirt has fabric sticking out of it, wasnt trimmed properly.The second gray shirt is not straight,  the neck line keeps sliding to one side and choking me.Its rubbish.  Dont buy it.

author: Gary
title: You get what you pay for.
body: Poor quality. Lost their shape pretty quickly. Now make me look sloppy and skinny at the same time. Unwearable after a few months. Just buy better t-shirts. Their boxers and socks are good though..

author: Olivier Côté
title: Bon chandail de tous les jours
body: Bon rapport qualité/prix, bon tissus, ne déteint pas, bonne coupe. Lavé plusieurs fois déjà, séchage à l’air libre, et je suis très content. J’en rachèterai des blancs pour l’été

author: Amazon Customer
title: Too Large
body: I wear size L and the t-shirts looks like XL+. So make sure to order one size smaller. Otherwise, if you are not looking for a soft and slim fit, it's worth the money.

author: Daisy
title: Good quality for the money.
body: My husband loved them. Not too thick and fit well under his workshirts. They wash up nice. No shrinkage. Roomy fit. Excellent price.

author: Michel Binette
title: Matériel ordinaire!
body: Satisfaisant pour le prix. Le matériel est de qualité très ordinaire….mais pour son utilisation c’est OK!

author: Susan Dobrowney
title: Great value
body: Good quality shirts. Great value. Bought as a gift for my son.  Fit is good washes well.  Only gave it 4 stars as the grey ones are not all cotton.

author: Obi Macaroni
title: Very good quality for the price!
body: I wasn’t expecting much since they’re cheap but the quality is great. They fit right and aren’t as short as other cheap tshirts.

author: JMB
title: Fits nicely
body: I like to buy these t-shirts for dirty/physical work. They are thin, fit nicely and it doesn't hurt too much when I damage them because they are not pricey. I ordered small so they would be tight (5' 10'' - 145 lbs) and they fit as expected.

title: Great buy
body: Purchased for me son.  He seems to love these shirts. Great price-quality point and very utilitarian which is what they needed to be. Washed up wonderfully with very minor shrinkage.  Solid purchase on all fronts.

author: Guy L.
title: Falling apart at the seams
body: Just rec'd product today. Fast delivery. Washed once and 1 out of 5 shirts the thread in arm sleeve came completely undone. How many more washes will I get?

author: Elvis
title: Great price great quality
body: I love these so much I’m definitely going to buy them again! Quality is good, shirts came packaged with no visible defects. Soft and comfortable and a great fit.

author: wayne newbery
title: shrunk so bad cant wear now
body: They fit just fine till in dryer on low good for 10 yr old now

author: Amazon Customer
title: Zero rating
body: These are terrible don’t waste your money. They shrink 1/2 the size and completely fell apart after the first wash.

author: Olive-Lee
title: Good quality and even better price
body: The material is really nice, super soft and stitching was great except I got the same size set my fiancé would normally get at this time it was too big by about an inch and a half

author: Michael Byrne
title: Back ordered , so filled order with something else.
body: I received a package of shirts that had been taped up and I could see that it included items that I had not ordered. Although my review is not a knock on the quality of the shirts but in the fulfillment of the order.I hope this review doesn't get rejected as well , it seems to be a valid complaint.

author: Eric G
title: if u wear black shirts every day, its good enough
body: i bought this twitce, so total of 12, just wear one every day , i like black t-shirt with jeans, this allows me to always use new shirts !

author: Jowe
title: Not the best quality
body: The length is too long . After 1 washing the shirt gets smaller it was shrank . It’s tight on my chest . I don’t want to wear them anymore

author: Natali
title: Suitable for work
body: Suitable for home or work, normal quality, but comfortable, I hope that it does not change its shape after washing.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Staff Uniforms - great for kitchens!
body: We love using these shirts for our kitchen staff in our restaurant, they are comfortable, wash well and economical. Lightweight enough to feel good in the heat.

author: Renee Allard
title: Great value!
body: Bought these for my teenage son and he likes them. Great value for number on shirts, decent thickness and he says they are comfy.

author: Nadia Lindsay
title: Pretty good shirts
body: Read a lot of the reviews and was nervous about receiving mine but I have no complaints on quality or sizing. Ordered Black 2XL and it’s true to size. Only thing is the shirts could be darker/more black.

author: Daniel Nadeau
title: Contant pour l’achat. (Qualité-prix)
body: En dessous d’une chemise, après un lavage sa rétrécie la prochaine fois je vais prendre Large au lieu de médium

author: Josée lamoureux
title: Xl à la place de large
body: Je me suis achetée des t-shirt large mais un coup passé dans la sécheuse 2 fois, on dirait qu'ils deviennent des médiums. Je leur ai donnée une 2e chance avec des XL et c'est merveilleux!! Alors, prenez une grandeur plus haute. Satisfaite quand même

author: xianxian
title: Thin and a bit short
body: They are quite thin. Also slightly on the short side. I am tall (6') and thin so finding shirts that stay tucked in the pants tends to be difficult; I usually need a medium otherwise I'll be floating in a large. These also shrink a fair amount.

author: BeniceS
title: Very large but shrinks in dryer
body: I thought of returning but worried about shrinkage after washing. They did shrink and fit my husband well.

author: JT, Saskatoon, SK
title: Outstanding t-shirts, very economically priced
body: This is a remarkably good value, which is sometimes interpreted as cheap or substandard or poorly made. These T-shirts are top quality cotton/cotton blend, well sewn and fit true to size. I’m so pleased I’ll be ordering again.

author: Jonathan Gray
title: Wash on gentle cycle
body: The shirts feel great when they are brand new but after the second wash I already have some fraying on two of the shirts. It was definitely a bargain when I bought them

author: Stacy Smith
title: Quality of the fabric
body: This site really doesn't want theses reviews, they want us to jump through hoops to make us not bother. They are t-shirts/under shirts reasonable quality a little bit longer than I like but nothing drastic so worth the cost overall.

author: Darren
title: The have pros and cons
body: Ok shirts...if plain is what you seek. The bottoms of the shirts fold up on me, so i probably will never wear this outside the house. Keep in mind they shrink in the washer, so buy bigger.

author: A C
title: Not at all as good as I thought.
body: At first they look good, but after one wash it shows like you have had it for a long time, not at all worth it.

author: Frank Popp
title: Need a halter top?
body: I ordered this bc the picture shows thrm as being longer but they shrunk up on the first wash. Thanks for the halter top. JUNK.

author: Jean Sebastien Boulanger Gauvin
title: Cheap but good quality
body: If u want some Quality Shirt for inside or Casual stuff without paying huge Buck their perfect

author: Bill Rodgers
title: Do not dry
body: Fit out of the package was good, unfortunately the T-shirt’s shrink an incredible amount in dryer. They are basically rags for the garage after one use as they literally shrunk up 4 inches.

author: Mark Bennett
title: Good quality, but...
body: Nice shirt, perfect fit out of the package, but they do shrink even when washed per the instructions.

author: Jen
title: Good value over womans t shirts
body: Bought these even though I'm a woman.  Cus 6 tshirts for 20 bucks beats 1 t shirt for 18..  apparently woman like to pay more for the same product.  Nice basic work shirts.  They seam to be holding up pretty well.

author: Chris
title: Didn't expect much for the price but they're actually really nice
body: Honestly didn't expect them to be such a nice fit and nice feel to them too. I've seen reviews saying they ripped easy but the sticking on mine seems solid. Bought them for work but ill probably keep 1 or 2 for non work clothes

author: Linda Frankson
title: dressing a teen
body: it is very hard to dress a teen there is always something they will complain about. but I lucked out with these TShirts and they don't lose their shape more do they shrink. I Will get more the shipping was great arrived in record time even before their estimated shipping time.

author: Marilia Prado
title: Amazing daily shirts
body: These are perfect for use in your day-to-day life, very simple and comfy. My husband loves it.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Falling apart out of the packaging.
body: Out of the bag falling apart. 10/10 quality if you like garbage.

author: Sir Scratch a lot
title: Love them.
body: Love these. Bought more. They're very soft and comfy and they last a while. For this quantity and quality and price, it's perfect.

author: Ruth
title: Disappointed.
body: Returned it. Too small, ordered XXXL but it was more a youth size than adult. Fabric thin and flimsy.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Best of the best
body: Fit exceeds expectations. I don’t remember the last time I wore a t shirt this comfortable. I always thought I was a Medium, but shirts always fit weird at either the shoulder, length, or waist. A Gildan Large fit perfectly everywhere. 11/10 recommended

author: Fukineh
title: Not nearly as long as they appear
body: Got the shirts, washed them in cold water dried with no heat. Way too Short!Yup just bought a pack of belly shirtsOh yeah, I’m 6’4 so if you’re under 6 foot they may be good but for a taller fellow… Nope waste of money

author: Lizzie Jaaka
title: Was better than I expected
body: My guy was running out of t-shirts to wear so I ordered this, he loves them

author: donna
title: Shrinks when washed
body: Shirts fit out of the package (L).  Followed washing instructions and shirts shrunk probably 1 size down!Beware!  I would like my money back!  Gave it 1 star because that's the lowest rating.

author: D3X
title: Great deal, very comfortable shirts.
body: These fit very nicely, not too snug but they taper nicely to the lower torso.  The fabric has a high quality cotton feel to it, the black is a deep solid colour.  Great buy!

author: VeggiesNotWedgies
title: Good value
body: Good value. Probably not my most ethical buy but these are a staple in my wardrobe. Basic cotton t-shirt. Thicker than Walmart brand.

author: Megan
title: Poor fit.
body: Just an overall poorly cut shirt. I’m 6’0 175 and most mediums fit well. These were just weirdly cut for an athletic build. Really short, loose sleeves. Longer than the average tshirt and was very wide through the abdomen.  My order got returned very quickly.

author: Harriet
title: Satisfied with purchase
body: Bought for my husband and really satisfied with the fit. Definitely love the different color options.

author: Highway420
title: Fits normally
body: I bought these and the white ones and love them. Quality is good for what you’re paying for them. Hold up okay in wash (so far).

author: André-Dany Asselin
title: Encore voler
body: Bravo les championsEncore fait volerPas fortNormalement je ne donnerais aucune étoile

author: Dmitri
title: Good quality, right colors T-shorts
body: Little bit longer than expected, but overall fits well! If I'll need more - I'll buy it again from the same seller

author: MOE S.
title: WIFE IS HAPPY WITH THEM
body: WE HAD GOT SOME LADIES T-SHIRTS,BUT SHRUNK SO BAD HAD TO IVE THEM AWAY.SO GOT MEN'S SHIRTS.

author: Antoine M.
title: Great quality, great price!
body: If you are tired of trying different brands at Walmart, I recommend these t-shirts.

author: Ed Sweet
title: Good deal
body: Washed them first then put them through the dryer. Fit the same as just out of the package.

author: Ashley
title: Shrinks a tad after a wash and dry
body: Great deal. Order a size or two up and if you can hang to dry, that might help too. They did shrink a tad but not too much

author: Ian Larson
title: Super comfy shirts
body: These shirts are aren't too flashy or anything, but if you want a comfortable shirt to sleep in or something to toss on for under a sweater, look no further because these shirts are comfortable as heck!!

author: Nikki B
title: Smaller than expected
body: We bought these Men Large shirts to tie dye for Christmas gifts for family. When we opened the package, we realized that they would only be suitable for the women.

author: Madison Lunn
title: An excellent buy
body: These shirts are actually really good quality. The sizing was spot on and they are comfortable and stylish. Will probably order more in another colour!

author: Duane Casteel
title: Good
body: They fit well, good brand.. plain white ones Ive bought have started to separate at the collar, hopefully these wont.

author: Lisa
title: Good quality. Nice and soft.
body: They are nice and soft. Boyfriend loves them. Wish I could get womens tops in a multipack with this quality and price!

author: Robert Phillips
title: Worth every penny and ordering more
body: Good fit, good quality and comfortable materials...No possible complaints andi will be ordering additional items

author: Rodney whitfield
title: Good deal
body: Great deal on these shirts for work a little thin but good quality and value for working on the car

author: Adam
title: Buy them if your not tall
body: Certain colors act differently when washed.Dark grey and black do not seem to shrink. The rest of them have gotten smaller

author: my pen name
title: Inexpensive, but.....
body: Thin material, and lighter than a 5 year old T that has been washed many times.

author: Marmite
title: Oversized
body: Thought i'd order XL as these days L may fit as a small if made in China. These are made in Honduras and really large sized so order accordingly.

author: Kristina
title: Cheap made
body: Cheap material .. look loose after wash.. won’t buy it again.

author: gravel
title: 1.74m pour 76.8 kilos égal large
body: 1.74m pour 76.8 kilos (tour de taille 35 pouce) égal grandeur de t-shirt largeLégèrement en de dessous de la ceinture 6 pouce environs (parfait)

author: t jich
title: good value
body: Order one size up for a leisurely fit. Nice material, no pesky labels and good everyday use.

author: Biscuit Jordan
title: Good deal
body: Buy one size bigger. In my case, after one washed and dried in dryer. it went shirk. I should had bought M instead of S

author: Jayden Johnson
title: Great fit
body: Comfortable and fits great.I'm not the type of person to have white clothes for too long, however, when I run out of white clothes I will happily purchase these again. 10/10 would recommend

author: pat morgan
title: Nice tee shirts
body: These shirts fit great and are comfortable. Went into the washer and no shrinkage or color running. Really like them

author: Amazon Customer
title: Nice soft shirts
body: Very very comfortable and and made very well

author: Evan Bou
title: Amazing!
body: Because of my height usually when I buy shirts they tend to not be long enough but these are amazing! Good quality! Would recommend!Edit: after washing and drying they shrink to an unusable size :(

author: Shaneil Sewak
title: Love it
body: Ordered extra large so I can wear as a night gown as I love long oversized shirt and I did not want to borrow my hubby's and these are great!!! Comfortable and cozy.

author: EC
title: Itchy
body: These looked too good to be true.Yeah... Too GOOD.No really though I do not recommend anyone to buy this unless you don't care about the feel of the t-shirt.These are NOT SOFT at ALL!!!

author: Christian george
title: Small
body: I ordered XLS. But they fit like a medium. Very small. And once they are washes the extra shrink.

author: Arya
title: Fits as expected
body: The shirts are pretty thick. Keep in mind these are tubular fit shirts, meaning there is no seams on the sides. Collars are also thick, washed them twice so far, minimal shrinking, collars have not wrinkled yet. They are kind of delicate, 1 shirt already has a tiny rip on the armpit area. But for like 4$ a shirt, it's a good deal.

author: Genevieve Hornblower
title: Good underwear t shirts
body: Orderd large instead of medium in case it would shrink in the dryer and they now fit perfectly for wearing under a work shirt. Husband is very happy with them.

author: Edward Tey
title: okay
body: Looks weird on me but comfortable. Got them as cheap throw away shirts. Durable, nice to work in and get messy with.

author: AJ
title: great quality thank you
body: just what I have expected. thanks  fit  a little loose I'm sure they will shrink a bit when they are washed  either then that very satisfied

author: JV
title: Great quality and Value
body: Bought this because I needed workout shirts.Fits well for me regardless and quality is as expected of Gildan. Will buy again.

author: Geoff B
title: Inferior quality to regular T-Shirt. Only suitable as undershirt
body: I wasn't very satisfied with the quality of these t-shirts.  They are thinner than the average t-shirt and the sleeves are about 1 inch too short.  Also the fabric seems to attract lint and pills more than expected.  Okay as an undershirt I guess but definitely not as a t-shirt.

author: Mashutka
title: Good for the house. Don’t buy to wear in public.
body: Already looking wonky after first wash but I guess that’s expected. Won’t buy again. Does the job for the time being

author: Jack
title: Quality T-shirts
body: Shirts fit as expected. They are very soft, breathable, and comfortable. Furthermore they are “tag-less” which is a nice addition adding to the comfort level.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great value
body: Great quality  at a great price. Will definitely  buy again

author: Ashley
title: Nice shirts.
body: My hubby is a little on the bigger size and these shirts fit him perfectly without having to size up or down. The shirts are soft and I feel like they are a good quality. I would definitely buy again.

author: Martin
title: Delivery was late
body: By the other reviews I can tell the quality of this shirts was as I expected, but I got the delivery for next day after my purchase, and they didn’t come on time. I had to go on a trip and I couldn’t have them on time, so I had to run to a store to buy more expensive stuff. I wish I could enjoy them as the other people did, but they didn’t get to meOn time 👎🏼

author: Nafees Syed
title: Value for money . Great for casual wear.
body: Good fitting tshirts. However , i think they shrink after a wash . Would recommend to go one size higher. The one i wore after a wash definitely felt tight.

author: Mrs. Colleen M. Paul
title: Gildan crew neck
body: Christmas gift, 100% cotton, use as undershirt in winter months.

author: Michael Coupland
title: Very comfortable t-shirt.
body: Very comfortable soft material with some stretch. Sleeve length a little short but acceptable. Use as every day t-shirt use. Looks good. I got the xl and fits as expected.

author: Curtis Selke
title: They fit good.
body: More shirts0 whether T-shirts or other types should have a common length while the size increases.If I ever try an X-Large shirt cause of wide shoulders the length increases and looks like a dress while a Large the shoulders are tight but the length is perfect.

author: Spencer
title: Great quality
body: Fits perfect even after washing. I'm a size medium and Don't like my work shirts too big.. perfect size. Will buy again

author: Tuan
title: Loose and out of shape after a wash
body: The items became somewhat out of shape after a wash, may be too thin.

author: Rebecca
title: Great shirts!
body: Fit my husband well and he always has problems finding shirts that do not shrink in the wash. The fit suited him nicely, not too clingy around the neck. Did not fade in the wash or lose its shape and lengthhighly recommended

author: Matt
title: Awesome Deal
body: Always bought Hanes shirts - Tried these out - Still good after a wash - Cold water only as per directions. But fit is good, shrunk a little bit after a wash but is expected. Very Happy with my purchase!!

author: ScubaPom
title: finally a long shirt that fit
body: love those for the price and that it fit me better than a brand shirt. you do myself tags with javex on it

author: Annie
title: Bien
body: Commandé du large pour mon homme, sa taille habituelle et ça fit parfaitement.  Il fait 5'7". 170 lbs.

author: Martin Malouin
title: rien a redire c'est honnête pour le prix
body: Je les utilises comme haut de pyjama. C'est la premiere fois que j'achete du linge sur internet. J'ai été motivé par le fait que j'ai de la misère a me trouver du 2X et 3X dans les magasin et cela est hors de prix. Mais avec Amazon cela a été concluant, je vais retenter l'expérience.

author: Jason
title: Over all good value (second order seems smaller?)
body: The shirts are good for undershirts, would have preferred a little thicker. Kind of loses shape. They seem a little smaller than my last order??

author: Mark
title: perfect fit until washed
body: It fit perfect but slightly shrunk after first wash. Im a bit fat at the belly so maybe when I lose my christmas mass it will work out ok.seems to be good quality

author: Nick Omiecinski
title: Good fit but assuming factory seconds
body: shirts fit great and are what you expect from gildan. 4 out of 5 shirts had threads pulling out right out of the bag, assuming shirts are factory seconds. But for 5$ a shirt you get what you get.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good Value
body: Fit well and no label to scratch your neck. They are a good weight for under a sweater or to sleep in. Wash well.

author: Sherry Griffiths
title: Gildan is a great product reasonable price
body: Gildan white crew T-shirts in a multipack, what’s pleasant surprise. This is a very good product for such a low price. I’ll be buying more as they make great gifts with a reasonable price and great quality. Thanks Amazon.Mitchell Griffiths

author: Amazon Customer
title: Good value
body: Would buy again. Good quality, good range if colours. Soft against skin.

author: Hugo
title: Nice quality
body: Haven't thrown them in the dryer, and have only washed in cold water, but they've retained their shape, and the quality of the cotton is really nice!

author: Ash
title: Not very breathable and shaped weird
body: The material isn't very breathable and also the shirt is too square shaped and too short.

author: gumrouge
title: tres bien
body: fit tres bien et pas cher en plus ...

author: Shaun
title: Great Shirts!
body: Such a good deal, for quality shirts!

author: Janelle Johnston
title: Too large fitting.
body: The shirts are basic which is fine for this price point but they're definitely too large. The large is more of an XLG so beware of that.

author: Amazoneur
title: Confortable et de qualité
body: Parfait je suis très bien dans mes nouveau T-shirts, ils sont plus long que la concurrence et j'apprécie car je suis quand même grand et j'aime pas trop les gilet bedaine 😅

author: Your Typical Mental
title: Incredible value
body: I am still staggered by the value of my order every time I look into my closet and conclude I can put off doing a load of whites for another few days.

author: WPDK
title: Poor Quality Seams
body: Within three or four washes, the seam of one shirt started to come apart.  The other t-shirts in the pack seem fine for now.

author: Irene
title: Bought for my son
body: I bought these for my son, he has not complained so I assume they fit great

author: Samantha
title: Good material, but shrank!
body: They looked great coming out of the package, but they shrunk quite a bit after being washed. They still fit but are a bit tight.

author: @bonkers380gt
title: Meh
body: You get 5 shirts under $30.So, do with that as you will!

author: Daniel K.
title: Two opinions
body: 1. Good quality.2. Gildan, please put a little more length on the sleeves. Just that little bit more will do.

author: LA
title: Great quality
body: Great quality. Thick, soft and comfortable.  Great price as well.

author: Mark
title: Il buy them again
body: I like the price. The shirt material is a little thin compared to the same brand bought in store. I definitely had to wash them before I could wear them. Fit seems a little big. Bought a few 6 packs for work shirts. After a coupke washes. Im happy with them.

author: Mark G
title: Good deal would buy again.
body: Good price for 12 shirts. Not to thin and comfortable. Some lose extra threads on some seems. But not ripped or anything.

author: IAM2HONEST
title: Great buy
body: Great buy. I order one size bigger and washed in hot water to shrink. Now they fit perfect and will shrink no more.

author: Nicolas Martineau
title: Tissus qui ramasse le poil
body: Bien mais ramasse le poil avec des animaux

author: Sadexes
title: Great for working out or sleeping in
body: This product is an affordable and comfortable option for your t-shirt needs. Honestly we can get a nice pack of shirts here or buy one 20+ dollar shirt somewhere else.

author: Gary A
title: A good fit here..
body: These t shirts are a bargain...  Don't shrink too much either... Another good mens t-shirt..

author: Zippyz
title: Men's large teeshirts
body: These tee-shirts are super comfortable I bought for my husband and they fit him very nice will definitely buy again.

author: Cathy
title: Nice feel, good fit & great value with the price
body: Great value, nice and soft and covers his belly nicely. The price is a fabulous deal so very happy 😋

author: Amanda

author: Jenn
title: Great
body: Thank youDose what it says

author: jean François lemay
title: Bonne qualité de Cotton
body: Hésitez pas à prendre ce produit

author: Harold O
title: Nice T Shirts
body: Fits properly when you order the right size. Arrived as promise and seems to be of good quality. Will re order👍

author: Bob Pearce
title: Probably won't last long
body: Fit is good, but after 3 or 4 washes some of the stitching Ona couple of the shorts has already started to come loose...Apart from that, nice clean well fitting t shirts

author: Riley Coles
title: Good undershirts
body: I bought these a size small to use as undershirts and the work perfectly.

author: kevin
title: Great shirts great price !
body: Bought the shirts for the price and because all the shirts I own I’ve been wearing for years. I couldn’t be happier with the shirts and I actually ordered another five! Price is right I’m 5”10” 220 and they fit perfectly

author: Frequent Buyer
title: I like these
body: They fit a tad bigger but not too much after washing and drying on high. Good feel and value if looking for a black logoless shirt.

author: gord mullins
title: great tee's for the money
body: five tee's for little over $20 how can ya go wrong fit good (for online ordering)

author: Benjamin Peterson
title: T shirts
body: Fit great at first but too small after washed and dried

author: K. G.
title: Great value and quality
body: Have been wearing these for more than 2 years and still in good shape. Strongly recommend

author: Rebecca
title: Pour le prix super chandail
body: Les chandails sont parfait la grandeur est bonne, pour le pris ça vaut vraiment la peine. Le seul hic est que je n'ai reçu que 6 chandails sur 12. J'attends le feedback du vendeur et je vais adapter ma note par la suite.

author: David
title: Good enough for the $
body: Good T-shirt for the price. Not the best quality and a bit on the thinner side but for the price it’s worth to get it. We’ll see how it holds up after couple of washes  4stars for me:)

author: sarah st-pierre
title: Je recommanderais n’importe quand!
body: Ils sont arrivés super rapidement. Ce sont des t-shirts de qualité pour le prix c’est imbattable. Je suis heureuse de cet achat.

author: Larouche Janick
title: Bon produit a bon prix.
body: Exactement comme la description sans les pectoraux

author: André
title: Livraison discutable.
body: Content du produit, mais la livraison est discutable, le livreur a laissé la boite sur le trottoir près de l'entrée et n'a pas sonné... N'importe qui aurait pu ramassé le colis.

author: Mark
title: Once you wash them, they shrink, and then become cleaning rags.
body: The quality on these shirts have depleted badly… they fit nicely once you try them on the first time, but after the 1st and 2nd wash… they become two sizes too small.

author: Monique Peters
title: Excellent value
body: These tshirts are surprising very good quality. They are a great value for your money.

author: Rhonda nolan
title: Awesome price, awesome shirts.
body: You cannot buy these shirts ANYWHERE, at this price, great quality , the fit is really nice.

author: Rays7000
title: better for cold weather
body: they are so good quality and they are soft but for me i feel so hot to wear them in summer as they are thick cotton.

author: O.J.
title: Love them..
body: These shirts are so nice and great, its absolutely wonderful. I love these shirts, great for work and some comfy.

author: Kristina
title: Would recommend
body: Nice fit, alittle big but it will probably shrink in the wash. My son overall likes them. I would buy more

author: Jem
title: beautiful tee's
body: 2 out of 5 shirts were cut (trimmer) after stiching prosses.Otherwise beautiful tees.Will not return. Too much waste.

author: AKA T3nity
title: It's a female shirt too❤ small fits perfectly
body: I am female, 115lbs and I ordered this because I love using loose shirt and small fots really well. Super  comfy. Am gonna order larger size next time for hubby because he got jealous with my shirt :)

author: Michael
title: Great quality shirts for the price.
body: Great quality shirts for the price. They fit a little long for my body but after one wash they shrank a little and now fit me perfectly.

author: chris
title: Perfect simple shirt pack
body: Shirts hold up and fit well

author: Daryl
title: too small

author: Stephen
title: Very comfortable T
body: Very comfortable T-shirts fit exactly as I would have expected.

author: Stephanie T
title: Too big, too loose.
body: I ordered a large for my husband and they were so incredibly big, I had to give the, away. Not true to size as well so I recommend a size lower or not to buy at all.

author: Jeremy D
title: POOR QUALITY, Avoid this one
body: Poor quality. VERY THIN MATERIAL, I'm returning it right away. Check my pictures

author: Eric Filiatreault
title: Super⁸
body: Livraison rapide mais un peu petit après lavage prendre un peu plus grandTrès.confortable et léger

author: Michael S.
title: great value !
body: bought these before..great value...great price !  fast shipping too !

author: Sheryl Smith
title: Very good quality for the money
body: My tire quality than one would expect for this low price. Finished off very well. Just the right thickness of material. Excellent deal.

author: Pierre-Luc G.
title: Turns bad after only 1 wash
body: Turns too small after only 1 wash (I didn't even put it in the dryer !?!?)

author: Jay
title: Buy cheap, get cheap
body: Wasn't expecting Gildan to sell such cheap quality fabric. After one wash, the t-shirts are pretty much useless. They are loose from the elbow down to the waist. Fabric is extremely itchy, I never had any problems like this in my life. I gave them away to charity. Would not recommend

author: Federico García
title: Very comfortable
body: Great for going out on a sunday walk or trip, to work out or relaxing at home.

author: Michael
title: Gildan Mens Crew T-Shirt
body: Decent shirts for the price.Get a size up as they do shrink a little bit after a wash and dry.

author: mario dube
title: Satisfait
body: Tres satisfait du produit je vais en reprendre lorsque ceux si seront fini j ai 5 et 8 193lbs de bonne epaule et j ai commander grandeur Large (42-44)

author: OliverJones
title: Thin as paper
body: Size was ok, the material is very thin, tight under the armpits. Will try an other model next time made by the same company. They were bought as work clothes so , they will get used.

author: Martin Lefebvre
title: Confortable et bon rapport qualité-prix !!
body: Très bon rapport qualité-prix . Parfait pour ma part , le chandail est très confortable . Manque à savoir si il gardera sa forme un coup laver à la machine !

author: Bera
title: Not the greatest quality
body: Bought a few sets from different sellers this was one of the least comfortable ones not that recommended

title: GILET BAS PRIX
body: Cotton cheap mais pour le prix c'est correct.  Je.les utilise en haut de pyjama.

title: Great Product
body: Great product, I am totally satisfied. I highly recommend it

title: Bon achat
body: Confortable, bien adapté

author: Kyle
title: Decent fit. Nice and soft.
body: Need more products for taller people. Bought them to tie dye and they worked for that.

author: Yarrr
title: Good quality tshirt
body: XL fits great, comfy, good value. These shirts are good, not see through either.

author: Targ
title: Survived the wash too

body: Bought these so that I could do some custom shirts and I'm very happy with the quality of the shirts. 6 shirts for this price is great

author: Hailey Pudan

author: Amazon Customer
title: Very thin
body: Based on other brands size these should have been loose fit, but are not. Material is very thin.

author: Robert S

title: Size up one

author: Robert
title: You get what you pay for no deal here.
body: Fabric is thinner than expected, the style and stitching are good though. Fabric is not pre-shrunk since it's cotten hang to dry so they do not shrink.

author: mark
title: Fits Way to large
body: I'm usually an extra large so thought these would fit the x large is more like an xxl and drapes off the body. Realy wish I got the large because now I've wasted money on something I can't wear

author: khang nguyen
title: very good quality.
body: i did not expect them to be so comfortable. they are just as good quality as the t-shirt that i paid a lot more money for them. highly recommended.

title: Big whole in the T-shirt
body: I wasn’t expecting a whole in the T-shirt. I guess you get what you pay for. Not recommended

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great value
body: Love buying these. Only thing sizing is a bit small I would go a size up or 2

author: Amazon Customer
title: Great deal and nice shirts
body: Happy I went and bought these. Really good deal. The same and better than some of what I get at stores for more than double the price, like George shirts for an example

author: Client d'Amazon
title: Bon produit
body: Bon produit, jai pris small,  6 pied 160 lbs sa fite juste parfait pour moi merci.

author: Deborah W.
title: Package of 6 not 12
body: I ordered two packages of 12.  They were sent out in different shipments.  The first one I received two packages of 6. Later the same day I received a package of 6 not 12.  So in all I paid for 24 and only got 18

author: KSZM
title: Good price. Good fit and feel.
body: Hubby likes them and he is VERY difficult to please when it comes to clothes. These did not aggravate his super sensitive skin!

author: R.S

body: Fabric felt itchy and one of the shirts had a small fold that was sewn into the shirt.  Would not recommend.

title: Quality is poor !
body: I purchase these t shirts to wear at work . They look good and the fit is great but unfortunately they are starting to have holes in them just after a few washes :(

title: Great t-shirt

title: Thin thin thin

body: These were purchased for my son who seems to really like them. They aren't so thin his chest hairs show (apparently that's an issue) and they wash well.

author: Cara
title: THEY SHRINK!!!!
body: Very dissatisfied with these shirts.  Seem nice out of the box, BUT THEY SHRINK!!  They shrunk so much after 1 washing, that they were barely wearable. After a second washing, they are pretty much garbage.  Never again.  Hope a refund is in order from Gildan.

author: Tyler. Pelletier

author: Beesh
title: awesome fit
body: I'm 6'6 and about 270lbs - which is admittedly about 50lbs more than I'm used to - but I quit smoking, changed jobs, and covid... like a lot of people I gained weight in the last 2 years and not by choice.  Regardless, the weight gain gave me a small pot belly and a lot of my old undershirts don't feel long enough anymore. Constantly riding up and I'm always pulling them down. Annoying. I've been looking for a comfortable, flattering fitted, but long t-shirt to wear around the house while I work and workout.These shirts nailed everything. Solid thickness, good stretch, perfect fit, awesome length...and it worked out to be around $4.50 CAD a shirt which is a fantastic deal.  Really couldn't be happier here. If you're a tall guy who likes a good fitted tshirt that has enough length to wear standalone or be tucked as an undershirt this is what you want. When the black comes back in stock in XL I'll be buying another 12 pack.

author: Mamun
title: ok for the price
body: You deserve what you paid for! Yes, this is the sentence that goes perfectly with these T-Shirts. The cut is not as shown in the pictures! Don't feel it will survive the machine wash! The only reason to give it 2* is because of the unbeatable price, almost CAD 5.5 per T-shirt! I wish the quality were a little better.

author: James
title: Cheap, but don't stand up over time
body: For the first couple of months I thought these Gildan black t-shirts were a bargain.  Then I noticed the sleeves became floppy and shrank in length.  Now the body has begun to shrink.  They've only been washed in cold water and hung to dry.  (The necks still look good, though.)  But, when I compare the these t-shirts to ones that I bought decades ago (really, no exaggeration) the Gildan t-shirts are a sad, sorry lot.

author: Ayse
title: As Described
body: Nothing more to add except that unable to edit height & weight for this review???Item was purchased for a 6ft tall man who weighs approximately 180lbsYet another Amazon SNAFU; sadly they’re new norm😞

author: Arti
title: Pretty light and thin
body: This is a good package if you're going to the gym regularly. The shirts are pretty thin so if you're a person who gets cold easily, I wouldn't recommend you this. I'm not sure about the durability but it's a fair package for the price

author: TheM’s
title: Only gave 4, not 5. Fit much larger than expected.
body: It's already been mentioned before (silly me, didn't check before) but you can't sell something that says 5 and then cover over the 5 with a 4 sticker and give 4 when someone paid for 5. Shady and uncool. Besides being too big, they were otherwise nice. My husband would have liked them.

author: Jason Coulls
title: It's worth the price.
body: For the price, these are good t-shirts.  They are a little on the thin side in comparison to store-bought single tees, and this is definitely reflected in the size of the package when it arrived.  They were rolled down to inconcievably small rolls.  However, they are still decent quality, and the fit was exactly what I expected.

author: Josh
title: Great buy for the price.
body: Very inexpensive option for those of us who like to wear fresh t-shirts often.Quality is what I would call wallmart, they fit my build perfect and don't cause any of that surface sweat that some materials do.Would buy again and again.

author: gary johnson
title: Don't wash it.
body: Walmart T shirts are a better quality. It's been a very long time since I've bought anything that would shrink in a cold water wash/ air dry. These shrank, cross the shoulders and at the sleeves. It wasn't a tiny bit of shrink it was a go down to one size smaller shrink. They fit like a garbage bag and have about as much shape. Carefully folded and put them with work clothes that I use to paint.

author: D. Hill
title: Comfortable and affordable
body: Purchased two sets of the Black and one of the White.The fit well for the size ordered, and is a lighter material than the Gildan Heavy Cotton most of my nerd shirts are.  I wanted something plain, since the overwhelming majority of my tees are Geek Chic prints and images.  The White shirts are a nice change from a decade of all black wardrobe as our summers get toastier.I have not encountered much shrinking.  After any wash, the fibers are a bit tighter, but a GENTLE stretch and it's fine.  I have noticed in the year and a half since my first order, the collars are starting to loosen a bit.  This is something that happens over time, but these are inexpensive shirts and well worth it.Over the three orders, my first set of 6 Black was $24.65, next was $25.99 bundled with 6 White for $26.99.  If the price floats a bit, wait until lower.  For a just over $4 tee, this is unbeatable

author: Lee
title: Realize that these are $4 t-shirts and you won't be disappointed
body: So it's $20 for 5 of them making each shirt $4.  As long as you are aware you're buying a $4 shirt you won't be disappointed.  After just washing them once, all the threads are hanging from the neck and the waist and they have all lost their shape even air drying.  There's always loose threads just hanging from it like they are coming apart.  They are find if you needed a shirt to wear one time or something but spend a bit more on some good quality shirts if you want them to last as these are really only good for maybe yard work or something.  They are basically the t-shirts you see on a rack in Chinatown.

author: Tapiwa Muza
title: First tshirts I've bought on Amazon and been happy with
body: As the title suggests, most tshirts I've bought on Amazon have either ended up being too small or too big and shrink at the first wash whether you hand wash or machine wash so very pleasantly surprised that these ones came through, especially with the comfort level, the fabric feels really good and reasonably durable for the price.

author: Jean-Michel Desrosiers
title: Great t-shirts!
body: I wear these all the time, pretty much only wear black or white tees lately and I find that these have a great fit, are comfy, thin enough to be breathable but thick enough to hide what it has to hide.They have that extra cm of length that makes them a good choice if you want to tuck them in, but personaly, I just throw them in the dryer without being scared that they come out too short.

author: ZM
title: Bang for the buck!
body: If you're buying these solely to use as a type of undershirt or work shirt, $20 for 5 of these is a bang for your buck. I typically wear these under my button up shirt for work and these fit very well and to size. If you are on the bigger side, I recommend getting a size larger because the material will shrink in the washing machine. Other than that, highly recommend this.

author: Reggie
title: Great clothing!!!!
body: No dislikes, very comfortable! Very well made I’m actually ordering some more Gilden stuff love there products they do really nice work for the price they are going to out last lots of my other shirts, thanks keep up the good work Gilden loved your advertising commercial online great products! Also they don’t shrink much, I like that, and the colour holds great after a bunch of wash’s.

author: K Lee
title: Great value
body: Very nice shirts for the money, a little on the thing side, but that's expected for the price.  No tags to irritate you.  Fit is maybe a little on the small side, but that worked for me as I fall between Medium and Large, so the Large fits just right, not too loose.  Much nicer product and better quality than the Hanes shirts that I'd been buying previously.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Awesome Tee Shirts
body: I have several Goldman Tee shirts so buying this deal was a no brainer, and as expected they are great shirts for the price! Getting 6 Tees for this price is awesome! I buy XL cause they fit loosely after washing them and drying them! No flaws in any one of my purchase and delivery was quick! Thank you!

author: Jeremy M.
title: Quality T-shirts.
body: I actually wasn't expecting these T-shirts to be so well made, given the relatively low price. But they are well-made. They wear and stretch comfortably and well, with a snug fit around your neckline that holds through 8 washes so far. It also doesn't shrink in the wash. The bright white colour holds over time.

author: Cats
title: I can't remember how many packs I've bought!
body: These fit great. Not to baggy. They are not considered the heavy duty model, which is great especially if you are wearing it under another shirt etc. I've bought so many packs over the years and with the best price per shirt, you can't go wrong!

author: Kaylasaurus
title: Great work shirts - better than the Hayes we’ve been buying
body: Bought these for the better half - works in construction - puts em through the wringer, he likes them, arrived fast and didn’t rip at the seams after one day like other packs of shirts have. Will buy again when we need to!

author: Richard Garceau
title: Super achat.
body: C’est un produit de qualité. Le tissu est doux et résiste bien lors de lavages. Des élastiques aux poignets lui donne un bon ajustement de la longueur es manches. Le vêtement est chaud sans l’être trop et absorbe bien là transpiration. Super achat.

author: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect
body: Quality made. Comfortable. Fits great. Only thing is the seams on inside rub a tiny bit on my shoulders , under pits area.could be better there. But I thru out all my old navy tshirts only wear these now

title: Great bang for buck
body: They never shrank on me like others said. They're actually pretty comfy. I like to wear them as work shirts, and they've held up pretty well. Better than the Hanes ones actually.

body: I had to retire some of my old shirts. They belonged to a younger, thinner man. These shirts are perfect and wear them constantly when I am just lounging around my house. Wish there was 2 of the Green, really like that color. Overall, very happy.

body: I bought these to wear solo and under my scrubs for work. They're a great layer that breathes and doesn't lose its shape.  They wash really well.
